 * Name                                              AIRPORT
 - Subclass Information                              
 * Comments                                          --- CPTCODE_23000 ----(This anchor is Deprecated)
 DATA_RIGHTS: HONEYWELL CONFIDENTIAL & PROPRIETARY
              THIS WORK CONTAINS VALUABLE CONFIDENTIAL AND PROPRIETARY
              INFORMATION. DISCLOSURE, USE OR REPRODUCTION OUTSIDE OF
              HONEYWELL INTERNATIONAL, INC. IS PROHIBITED EXCEPT AS
              AUTHORIZED IN WRITING. THIS UNPUBLISHED WORK IS PROTECTED BY

              EVENT OF PUBLICATION, THE FOLLOWING NOTICE SHALL APPLY:

Code Anchor: CPTcode_SDU_00089
 

 - Help Book Title                                   
 * Title                                             COREPT STARTFORM
 * Console Window                                    BASE_WINDOW
 * Menu Module                                       corept_menu
 - Initial Menu                                      
 - Defer Required Enforcement                        No
 - Menu Role                                         
 - Mouse Navigation Limit                            Form
 - First Navigation Data Block                       
 - Current Record Visual Attribute Group

 * Maximum Query Time                                0
 - Maximum Records Fetched                           0
 - Isolation Mode                                    Read Committed
 * Coordinate System                                 
   ----------
   * Coordinate System                               Real
   * Real Unit                                       Point
   * Default Font Scaling                            Yes
   * Character Cell Height                           14
   * Character Cell Width                            7
   ----------

 - Form Vertical Toolbar Canvas

   * Subclass Information

DECLARE
   msgnum NUMBER       := error_CODE; 
   msgtxt VARCHAR2(80) := error_TEXT; 
   msgtyp VARCHAR2(3)  := error_TYPE; 
   v_block_name    varchar2(30):= :system.cursor_block;   -- SCR 5767 
BEGIN 
   Set_Application_Property(cursor_style,'DEFAULT');
   IF (msgnum = 40400 or msgnum = 40406 or msgnum = 40407) THEN 
      Message('Changes saved successfully'); 
   ELSIF msgnum in (41051, 40350, 47316, 40353) then
   	  null;
   ELSIF msgnum = 41050 and :parameter.work_type = 'VIEW' then
   	  null;
   ELSIF msgnum in (40401, 40405) THEN 
      null;

   ELSIF msgnum = 40100 then
   		clear_message;
   		message('At the first record.');
   ELSIF msgnum = 40735 and msgtxt like '%01031%' then
   		clear_message;
   		dsp_msg(msgtxt||' Insufficient privileges. ');
   ELSIF msgnum in (40508,40509) then
   		dsp_msg(msgtxt||chr(10)||chr(10)||
   		'Please check the exact error message from the "Display Error" in the "HELP" menu');
   		--raise form_trigger_failure; 	

   ELSIF msgnum IN (40200) THEN
   	IF :parameter.upd_rec = 'Y' THEN
   		IF :parameter.work_type != 'VIEW' THEN
 --Begin Fix - SCR 5767 -Madhu-- 14-Sep-2012  			
         IF :parameter.record_type = 'T' Then 
         	dsp_action_msg ('U',:parameter.record_type, name_in('global.dcr_number'),NVL(name_in(v_block_name||'.processing_cycle'),:global.processing_cycle),
         	name_in(:SYSTEM.CURSOR_BLOCK||'.CUSTOMER_IDENT'));
         ELSE
         	dsp_action_msg ('U',:parameter.record_type, name_in('global.dcr_number'),NVL(name_in(v_block_name||'.processing_cycle'),:global.processing_cycle));
         END IF;
--End Fix - SCR 5767 -Madhu -- 14-Sep-2012   			
   		ELSE
   			dsp_msg(msgtxt);
   	  	raise form_trigger_failure;			
   	  END IF;	
   	ELSE
   		dsp_msg(msgtxt);
   	  raise form_trigger_failure;	
   	END IF ;
   	ELSIF msgnum = 41050 and :parameter.work_type != 'VIEW' then
   	  IF :parameter.upd_rec = 'Y' THEN
   	  	NULL;
   	  ELSE
   	  	dsp_msg(msgtxt);
   	  	raise form_trigger_failure;
   	  END IF;
	
   ELSE 
      display_alert.one_button('S','Error',msgtyp||'-'||TO_CHAR(msgnum)||': '||msgtxt); 
      --raise form_trigger_failure;
   END IF; 
END; 

   - Fire in Enter-Query Mode                        Yes
   - Execution Hierarchy                             Override
   - Display in 'Keyboard Help'                      No
   - 'Keyboard Help' Text                            
   - Trigger Steps

   * Name                                            ON-MESSAGE

DECLARE
   msgnum NUMBER       := MESSAGE_CODE; 
   msgtxt VARCHAR2(80) := MESSAGE_TEXT; 
   msgtyp VARCHAR2(3)  := MESSAGE_TYPE; 
BEGIN 
   Set_Application_Property(cursor_style,'DEFAULT');
   IF (msgnum = 40400 or msgnum = 40406 or msgnum = 40407) THEN 
     CLEAR_MESSAGE;
--Begin Fix SCR 5767 -- Madhu --14-Sep-2012     
     	:parameter.upd_rec:='N';
		  set_block_property(Name_in('System.Cursor_Block'),update_allowed,property_true);
--End Fix SCR 5767 -- Madhu --14-Sep-2012 
     Message('Record has been saved successfully'); 
   ELSIF msgnum in (41051,40350,47316,40353) then
   	  null;
   ELSIF msgnum = 41050 and :parameter.work_type = 'VIEW' then
   	  null;
   ELSIF msgnum in (40401, 40405) THEN 
      null;
   ELSIF msgnum = 40352 THEN --7470
			Message('Last Record Retrieved.');
   ELSE 
      display_alert.one_button('S','Error',msgtyp||'-'||TO_CHAR(msgnum)||': '||msgtxt); 
      raise form_trigger_failure;
   END IF; 
END; 
   - Fire in Enter-Query Mode                        Yes
   - Execution Hierarchy                             Override
   - Display in 'Keyboard Help'                      No
   - 'Keyboard Help' Text                            
   - Trigger Steps                                   
   ----------
   * Name                                            WHEN-NEW-FORM-INSTANCE
   - Subclass Information                            
   - Comments                                        
   - Trigger Style                                   PL/SQL
   * Trigger Text                                    

Initialize_Form;
:global.new_dcr_no := '';--7470
Hide_View('STD_TLD_FIX_STK');--Fix SCR 6248.01 --Madhu--10-Feb-2014
set_block;
if_from_error_summary;

--Begin SCR 7470 --Madhu
	If :PARAMETER.WORK_TYPE != 'VIEW' Then
		Set_Item_Property('CONTROL_BLOCK.CHK_UNCHK_ALL', DISPLAYED, PROPERTY_TRUE);
		Set_Item_Property('PL_TLD_AIRPORT_MR.CHK',DISPLAYED, PROPERTY_TRUE);
	Else 
		Set_Item_Property('CONTROL_BLOCK.CHK_UNCHK_ALL', DISPLAYED, PROPERTY_FALSE);
		Set_Item_Property('PL_TLD_AIRPORT_MR.CHK',DISPLAYED, PROPERTY_FALSE);
	End IF;


DECLARE

	group_id      recordgroup;
	col_id        groupcolumn;
	v_group VARCHAR2(50) := 'NEW_DCR';	
BEGIN
	
	group_id := find_group(v_group);
	IF NOT id_null(group_id) THEN
		DELETE_GROUP(v_group);
	ELSE
		group_id := create_group(v_group);
		col_id := Add_group_column(group_id,'DCR_NO',NUMBER_COLUMN);
	END IF;
END;
--End Fix SCR 7470 --Madhu

   - Fire in Enter-Query Mode                        Yes
   - Execution Hierarchy                             Override
   - Display in 'Keyboard Help'                      No
   - 'Keyboard Help' Text

	refresh_master_library.set_key_update_false(:System.Cursor_Block);

   - Fire in Enter-Query Mode                        Yes

DECLARE

	p_block varchar2(50) := :system.cursor_block;
	v_allow_update number:=0; --SCR 5767

BEGIN

	if p_block like 'PL_%' then
	if :system.mode = 'NORMAL' and nvl(name_in(p_block||'.validate_ind'),'N') != 'Y' 
		and name_in(p_block||'.processing_cycle') is not null then
		do_validate(p_block);
	else
		set_initial_error_display(p_block);		
	end if;	
	
	if :parameter.work_type != 'VIEW' and :parameter.record_type = 'T' then
		if name_in(p_block||'.generated_in_house_flag') = 'N' then
			set_item_property(p_block||'.processing_cycle',update_allowed,PROPERTY_FALSE);
			set_item_property(p_block||'.generated_in_house_flag',update_allowed,PROPERTY_FALSE);
			set_item_property(p_block||'.validate_ind',update_allowed,PROPERTY_TRUE);
			if p_block not like '%MR' then
				set_item_property(p_block||'.processing_cycle',current_record_attribute,'Not_updatable');
				set_item_property(p_block||'.generated_in_house_flag',current_record_attribute,'Not_updatable');
				set_item_property(p_block||'.validate_ind',current_record_attribute,'default');
			end if;
		else
			set_item_property(p_block||'.generated_in_house_flag',update_allowed,PROPERTY_TRUE);
			set_item_property(p_block||'.validate_ind',update_allowed,PROPERTY_FALSE);		
			if p_block not like '%MR' then
				set_item_property(p_block||'.generated_in_house_flag',current_record_attribute,'default');
				set_item_property(p_block||'.validate_ind',current_record_attribute,'Not_updatable');	
			end if;
				if :global.lib_refreshed = 'Y' and name_in(p_block||'.generated_in_house_flag') = 'Y' then
					set_item_property(p_block||'.processing_cycle',update_allowed,PROPERTY_FALSE);
					if p_block not like '%MR' then
						set_item_property(p_block||'.processing_cycle',current_record_attribute,'Not_updatable');
					end if;
				else	
					set_item_property(p_block||'.processing_cycle',update_allowed,PROPERTY_TRUE);
					if p_block not like '%MR' then
						set_item_property(p_block||'.processing_cycle',current_record_attribute,'default');
					end if;
				end if;				
		end if;	
	End If;
-- Begin Fix - SCR 5767 -Madhu -- 14-Sep-2012					
			If :parameter.record_type = 'T' Then
				If name_in(p_block||'.processing_cycle') is null then
					v_allow_update:=CHECK_VALID_SUPP_CUST(:global.processing_cycle, :global.processing_cycle, :global.dcr_number,:global.data_supplier,:parameter.record_type, name_in(p_block||'.customer_ident'));
				else
					v_allow_update:=CHECK_VALID_SUPP_CUST(name_in(p_block||'.processing_cycle'), :global.processing_cycle, :global.dcr_number,:global.data_supplier,:parameter.record_type, name_in(p_block||'.customer_ident'));	
				end if;	
			Else
					If name_in(p_block||'.processing_cycle') is null then
						v_allow_update:=CHECK_VALID_SUPP_CUST(:global.processing_cycle, :global.processing_cycle, :global.dcr_number,:global.data_supplier,:parameter.record_type);	
					Else
						v_allow_update:=CHECK_VALID_SUPP_CUST(name_in(p_block||'.processing_cycle'), :global.processing_cycle, :global.dcr_number,:global.data_supplier,:parameter.record_type);	
					End If;	
			End If;

			If v_allow_update = 1 Then
						:parameter.upd_rec:='N';
		  			set_block_property(p_block,update_allowed,property_true);
		  			
			Else
						:parameter.upd_rec:='Y';
		  			set_block_property(p_block,update_allowed,property_false);
		  			If name_in(p_block||'.processing_cycle') <> :global.processing_cycle then
								RAISE FORM_trigger_failure;
		  			End If;
		  End If;
--End Fix - SCR 5767 -Madhu -- 14-Sep-2012				
 end if;	
END;

   - Fire in Enter-Query Mode                        Yes
   - Execution Hierarchy                             Override
   - Display in 'Keyboard Help'                      No
   - 'Keyboard Help' Text                            
   - Trigger Steps                                   
   ----------
   * Name                                            WHEN-VALIDATE-RECORD
   * Subclass Information                            
     ----------
     * Source File                                   corept_template.fmb
     - Source Path                                   
     - Source Module                                 
     * Source Level                                  
       ----------
       * Source Name                                 COREPT_TEMPLATE
       ----------
       * Source Name                                 WHEN-VALIDATE-RECORD
       ----------
     ----------
   - Comments                                        
   - Trigger Style                                   PL/SQL
   o Trigger Text                                    

declare
	p_block varchar2(50) := :system.cursor_block;
begin	
if p_block like 'PL_%' and :system.record_status in ('CHANGED','INSERT') then
	if nvl(name_in(p_block||'.validate_ind'),'Y') not in ('Y','S','H','W','N','I','O') then
		dsp_msg('Validate indicator can only ''Y'',''S'',''H'',''W'',''N'' or ''I''');
		raise form_trigger_failure;
	end if;	
-- Begin Fix -- SCR 3935 -- Sesha
  if nvl(name_in(p_block||'.ctld_arsp_ind'),'A') not in ('A','C','M','R','T') then
		dsp_msg('Controlled Airspace Indicator can only ''A'',''C'',''M'',''R'' or ''T''');
		raise form_trigger_failure;
  end if;	
-- End Fix -- SCR 3935 -- Sesha
	if :parameter.record_type = 'T' then
		validate_extra_fields(name_in(p_block||'.processing_cycle'),name_in(p_block||'.generated_in_house_flag'));
	end if;
	if name_in(p_block||'.processing_cycle') is not null and name_in(p_block||'.DATA_SUPPLIER') is null then
		copy(:global.data_supplier,p_block||'.DATA_SUPPLIER');
	end if;	
	do_validate(p_block);
	if :parameter.work_type != 'VIEW' and :parameter.record_type = 'T' then
		if name_in(p_block||'.generated_in_house_flag') = 'N' then
			set_item_property(p_block||'.processing_cycle',update_allowed,PROPERTY_FALSE);
			set_item_property(p_block||'.generated_in_house_flag',update_allowed,PROPERTY_FALSE);
			set_item_property(p_block||'.validate_ind',update_allowed,PROPERTY_TRUE);
			if p_block not like '%MR' then
				set_item_property(p_block||'.processing_cycle',current_record_attribute,'Not_updatable');
				set_item_property(p_block||'.generated_in_house_flag',current_record_attribute,'Not_updatable');
				set_item_property(p_block||'.validate_ind',current_record_attribute,'default');
			end if;
		else
			set_item_property(p_block||'.processing_cycle',update_allowed,PROPERTY_TRUE);
			set_item_property(p_block||'.generated_in_house_flag',update_allowed,PROPERTY_TRUE);
			set_item_property(p_block||'.validate_ind',update_allowed,PROPERTY_FALSE);		
			if p_block not like '%MR' then
				set_item_property(p_block||'.processing_cycle',current_record_attribute,'default');
				set_item_property(p_block||'.generated_in_house_flag',current_record_attribute,'default');
				set_item_property(p_block||'.validate_ind',current_record_attribute,'Not_updatable');	
			end if;
		end if;	
	end if;
end if;
end;
   - Fire in Enter-Query Mode                        Yes
   - Execution Hierarchy                             Override
   - Display in 'Keyboard Help'                      No
   - 'Keyboard Help' Text

		null;
	else

		copy('Y',:system.cursor_block||'.generated_in_house_flag');
	end if;
end if;

Declare

	v_allow_update number :=0; --SCR 5767
	ls_Block_Name    varchar2(30):= :system.cursor_block;
--Begin Fix SCR 6248.01 --Madhu--10-Feb-2014
	ln_Button NUMBER;
	ln_Dcr_No NUMBER;
	ls_Table_Name VARCHAR2(30);
	ls_Airport_Ident 	Pl_Std_Airport.Airport_Ident%TYPE;
	ls_Airport_Icao 	Pl_Std_Airport.Airport_Icao%TYPE;
	ln_Processing_Cycle NUMBER;
	ls_Ref_Info VARCHAR2(1):=NULL;
BEGIN

	ls_Airport_Ident := Name_In(ls_Block_Name||'.Airport_Ident');
	ls_Airport_Icao := Name_In(ls_Block_Name||'.Airport_Icao');
	ln_Processing_Cycle := Name_In(ls_Block_Name||'.Processing_Cycle');
--End Fix SCR 6248.01 --Madhu--10-Feb-2014

IF :parameter.work_type = 'VIEW' then
	null;
ELSE
	If :system.record_status not in ('NEW','INSERT') then
--Begin Fix - SCR 5767 -Madhu -- 14-Sep-2012		
			If :parameter.record_type = 'T' Then
				If name_in(ls_Block_Name||'.processing_cycle') is null then
					v_allow_update:=CHECK_VALID_SUPP_CUST(:global.processing_cycle, :global.processing_cycle, :global.dcr_number,:global.data_supplier,:parameter.record_type, name_in(ls_Block_Name||'.customer_ident'));
				Else
					v_allow_update:=CHECK_VALID_SUPP_CUST(name_in(ls_Block_Name||'.processing_cycle'), :global.processing_cycle, :global.dcr_number,:global.data_supplier,:parameter.record_type, name_in(ls_Block_Name||'.customer_ident'));	
				End If;
			Else
					If name_in(ls_Block_Name||'.processing_cycle') is null then
						v_allow_update:=CHECK_VALID_SUPP_CUST(:global.processing_cycle, :global.processing_cycle, :global.dcr_number,:global.data_supplier,:parameter.record_type);	
					Else
						v_allow_update:=CHECK_VALID_SUPP_CUST(name_in(ls_Block_Name||'.processing_cycle'), :global.processing_cycle, :global.dcr_number,:global.data_supplier,:parameter.record_type);	
					End If;	
			End If;		
		If v_allow_update = 1 Then		
--End Fix - SCR 5767 -Madhu -- 14-Sep-2012		
			if display_alert.more_buttons('S','Delete Record','You are going to delete this record. Please be sure.'||chr(10)||
																			' ','Delete It', 'Cancel') = 1 then
					DECLARE
						p_table_type 		varchar2(5) :='M2C';
						ls_Block_Name    	varchar2(30):= :system.cursor_block;		
						p_table_name 		varchar2(50):= ltrim(upper(get_block_property(ls_Block_Name,QUERY_DATA_SOURCE_NAME)),'PL_');
						v_dcr_number    	number := name_in(ls_Block_Name||'.create_dcr_number');
						v_processing_cycle 	number(6):= name_in(ls_Block_Name||'.processing_cycle');
						v_validate_ind  	varchar2(1) := name_in(ls_Block_Name||'.validate_ind');
						v_status        	varchar2(10):= :system.record_status;
					BEGIN
						if v_status = 'CHANGED' then -- incase validate_ind is manualy modified by user
							v_validate_ind := refresh_ml_utilities.get_validate_ind(get_block_property(ls_Block_Name,QUERY_DATA_SOURCE_NAME),
																										name_in(ls_Block_Name||'.create_dcr_number'));
						end if;
						if v_validate_ind in ('Y','S','H','O') then
							IF refresh_master_library.check_reference_info(ls_Block_Name,'D') = 'N' THEN
--Begin Fix SCR 6248.01 --Madhu--10-Feb-2014
				    			Forms_Utilities.Du_Std_Tld_Fix_Prc(NULL,
																										 NULL,
																										 ls_Airport_Ident,
																										 ls_Airport_Icao,
																									   'P',
																										 'A',
																										 :Global.Data_Supplier,
																											ln_Processing_Cycle,
																											ln_Dcr_No,
																											ls_Table_Name
																											);
				    			ls_Ref_Info := 'N';   		
				    			Show_View('STD_TLD_FIX_STK');
				    			Hide_View('STD_TLD_FIX_STK'); 			
--End Fix SCR 6248.01 --Madhu--10-Feb-2014
							END IF;																						
						end if;
--Begin Fix SCR 6248.01 --Madhu--10-Feb-2014
					IF ln_Dcr_No IS NOT NULL THEN
		  			 IF display_alert.more_buttons
		                     ('S','Reference Record',
													'This Fix has Reference.Do You Want to Delete the Fix?'||chr(10)||' ',
												 'Yes', 'No') = 1 THEN
							Forms_Utilities.Du_Update_Ref_Table_Prc(Name_In(ls_Block_Name||'.Create_DCR_Number'),ln_Dcr_No,ls_Table_Name);
						 ELSE					 
							RAISE Form_Trigger_Failure;
					   END IF;
			    ELSIF ls_Ref_Info = 'N' THEN 
			    	RAISE Form_Trigger_Failure; 	
					END IF;
--End Fix 6248.01 --Madhu--10-Feb-2014
						if v_validate_ind in ('Y','S','H','O') then
							refresh_master_library.delete_from_ref_table(v_dcr_number);
						end if;
						--
						IF :global.lib_refreshed = 'Y' and
							v_processing_cycle IN (:global.new_processing_cycle,:global.old_processing_cycle) AND
							v_validate_ind IN ('Y','S','H','O') THEN
							refresh_master_library.refresh_a_record(p_table_type,v_dcr_number,v_processing_cycle,p_table_name,'I');
							delete_record;
							commit_form;
							refresh_master_library.set_record_group(v_dcr_number,'I',ls_Block_Name,v_processing_cycle,'D'); -- Added on 01/22/2004
							dsp_msg('The refresh master library table for this deletion is done and all changes are commited.');
						ELSE
							delete_record;
						END IF;
					END;
			end if;
--Begin Fix - SCR 5767 -Madhu -- 14-Sep-2012
		Else
         IF :parameter.record_type = 'T' Then 
         	dsp_action_msg ('D',:parameter.record_type, name_in('global.dcr_number'),NVL(name_in(ls_Block_Name||'.processing_cycle'),:global.processing_cycle),
         	name_in(:SYSTEM.CURSOR_BLOCK||'.CUSTOMER_IDENT'));
         ELSE
         	dsp_action_msg ('D',:parameter.record_type, name_in('global.dcr_number'),NVL(name_in(ls_Block_Name||'.processing_cycle'),:global.processing_cycle));
         END IF;	
		End If;
--End Fix - SCR 5767 -Madhu -- 14-Sep-2012			
	else
		if name_in(:system.cursor_block||'.validate_ind') in ('Y','S','H','O') then
			refresh_master_library.delete_from_ref_table(name_in(:system.cursor_block||'.create_dcr_number'));
		end if;
		delete_record;		
	
	END IF;
 End If;
END; --begin end
   - Fire in Enter-Query Mode                        Yes
   - Execution Hierarchy                             Override
   - Display in 'Keyboard Help'                      No
   - 'Keyboard Help' Text                            
   - Trigger Steps                                   
   ----------
   * Name                                            PRE-UPDATE
   * Subclass Information                            
     ----------
     * Source File                                   corept_template.fmb
     - Source Path                                   
     - Source Module                                 
     * Source Level                                  
       ----------
       * Source Name                                 COREPT_TEMPLATE
       ----------
       * Source Name                                 PRE-UPDATE
       ----------
     ----------
   - Comments                                        
   - Trigger Style                                   PL/SQL
   o Trigger Text                                    

declare
	v_block_name         varchar2(30):= :system.cursor_block;
	v_dcr_number         number := name_in(v_block_name||'.create_dcr_number');
	v_processing_cycle   number(6):= name_in(v_block_name||'.processing_cycle');
	v_table              varchar2(30):= get_block_property(v_block_name,QUERY_DATA_SOURCE_NAME);
	v_validate_ind_new   varchar2(1);
	v_validate_ind_old   varchar2(1);
begin

	v_validate_ind_old := refresh_ml_utilities.get_validate_ind(v_table,v_dcr_number);

	if v_validate_ind_old in ('Y','S','H','O') then	
		refresh_master_library.delete_from_ref_table(v_dcr_number);
	end if;	

	do_validate(v_block_name,'N');
	--
	v_validate_ind_new := name_in(v_block_name||'.validate_ind');
	if v_validate_ind_old in ('Y','S','H','O') and v_validate_ind_new in ('W','N','I') then
		if refresh_master_library.check_reference_info(v_block_name) = 'N' then
			raise form_trigger_failure;
		end if;
	end if;
	-- set for refreshing
	if :global.lib_refreshed = 'Y' and
		v_processing_cycle in (:global.new_processing_cycle,:global.old_processing_cycle) then	
		if v_validate_ind_new in ('Y','S','H','O') or v_validate_ind_old in ('Y','S','H','O') then
			refresh_master_library.set_record_group(v_dcr_number,v_validate_ind_new,v_block_name,v_processing_cycle,'U');
		end if;
	end if;
end;
   - Fire in Enter-Query Mode                        Yes
   - Execution Hierarchy                             Override
   - Display in 'Keyboard Help'                      No
   - 'Keyboard Help' Text                            
   - Trigger Steps                                   
   ----------
   * Name                                            PRE-INSERT
   * Subclass Information                            
     ----------
     * Source File                                   corept_template.fmb
     - Source Path                                   
     - Source Module                                 
     * Source Level                                  
       ----------
       * Source Name                                 COREPT_TEMPLATE
       ----------
       * Source Name                                 PRE-INSERT
       ----------
     ----------
   - Comments                                        
   - Trigger Style                                   PL/SQL
   o Trigger Text                                    

DECLARE
   v_validate_ind       VARCHAR2 (1);
   v_dcr_number         NUMBER;
   v_processing_cycle   NUMBER (6);
   v_block_name         VARCHAR2 (30) := :SYSTEM.cursor_block;
   v_allow_update       NUMBER := 0; --SCR 5767
BEGIN
   check_wildcard_for_keys (v_block_name);

   IF :SYSTEM.record_status IN ('CHANGED', 'INSERT') THEN
      -- Begin Fix - SCR 5767 -Madhu -- 14-Sep-2012
      IF :parameter.record_type = 'T' THEN
         IF NAME_IN (v_block_name || '.processing_cycle') IS NULL THEN
            v_allow_update := CHECK_VALID_SUPP_CUST (:global.processing_cycle,:global.processing_cycle,:global.dcr_number,:global.data_supplier,:parameter.record_type,NAME_IN (v_block_name || '.customer_ident'));
         ELSE
            v_allow_update := CHECK_VALID_SUPP_CUST (NAME_IN (v_block_name || '.processing_cycle'),:global.processing_cycle,:global.dcr_number,:global.data_supplier,:parameter.record_type,NAME_IN (v_block_name || '.customer_ident'));
         END IF;
      ELSE
         IF NAME_IN (v_block_name || '.processing_cycle') IS NULL  THEN
            v_allow_update := CHECK_VALID_SUPP_CUST (:global.processing_cycle,:global.processing_cycle,:global.dcr_number,:global.data_supplier,:parameter.record_type);
         ELSE
            v_allow_update := CHECK_VALID_SUPP_CUST (NAME_IN (v_block_name || '.processing_cycle'),:global.processing_cycle,:global.dcr_number,:global.data_supplier,:parameter.record_type);
         END IF;
      END IF;
   -- End Fix - SCR 5767 -Madhu -- 14-Sep-2012
   END IF;

   IF v_allow_update = 1 THEN   --SCR 5767
      COPY (:global.data_supplier, v_block_name || '.data_supplier');
      COPY (0, v_block_name || '.file_recno');

      SELECT dcr_number_seq.NEXTVAL INTO v_dcr_number FROM DUAL;
      COPY (v_dcr_number, v_block_name || '.create_dcr_number');

      -- Do Validation
      do_validate (v_block_name, 'N');
      v_validate_ind := NAME_IN (v_block_name || '.validate_ind');
      v_processing_cycle := NVL (NAME_IN (v_block_name ||'.processing_cycle'),:global.processing_cycle);

      -- Set for refreshing
      IF :global.lib_refreshed = 'Y' AND v_processing_cycle IN (:global.new_processing_cycle, :global.old_processing_cycle)
         AND v_validate_ind IN ('Y', 'S', 'H', 'O') THEN
         refresh_master_library.set_record_group (v_dcr_number, v_validate_ind, v_block_name, v_processing_cycle, 'I');
      END IF;
--Begin Fix - SCR 5767 -Madhu -- 14-Sep-2012
   ELSE
         IF :parameter.record_type = 'T' Then 
         	dsp_action_msg ('I',:parameter.record_type, name_in('global.dcr_number'),NVL(name_in(v_block_name||'.processing_cycle'),:global.processing_cycle),
         	name_in(:SYSTEM.CURSOR_BLOCK||'.CUSTOMER_IDENT'));
         ELSE
         	dsp_action_msg ('I',:parameter.record_type, name_in('global.dcr_number'),NVL(name_in(v_block_name||'.processing_cycle'),:global.processing_cycle));
         END IF;
   END IF;
--End Fix - SCR 5767 -Madhu -- 14-Sep-2012
END;
   - Fire in Enter-Query Mode                        Yes
   - Execution Hierarchy                             Override
   - Display in 'Keyboard Help'                      No
   - 'Keyboard Help' Text                            
   - Trigger Steps                                   
   ----------
   * Name                                            KEY-ENTQRY
   * Subclass Information                            
     ----------
     * Source File                                   corept_template.fmb
     - Source Path                                   
     - Source Module                                 
     * Source Level                                  
       ----------
       * Source Name                                 COREPT_TEMPLATE
       ----------
       * Source Name                                 KEY-ENTQRY
       ----------
     ----------
   - Comments                                        
   - Trigger Style                                   PL/SQL
   o Trigger Text                                    

if :system.mode = 'NORMAL' and :parameter.work_type != 'VIEW' then
	check_to_commit('ENTER_QUERY');
end if;	
:CONTROL_BLOCK.CHK_UNCHK_ALL := 'N'; -- 7470
:global.new_dcr_no := '';--7470
corept_enter_query;
if :system.mode = 'NORMAL' then
	unset_query_menu_items;
end if;
   - Fire in Enter-Query Mode                        Yes
   - Execution Hierarchy                             Override
   - Display in 'Keyboard Help'                      No
   - 'Keyboard Help' Text                            
   - Trigger Steps                                   
   ----------
   * Name                                            KEY-EXIT
   * Subclass Information                            
     ----------
     * Source File                                   corept_template.fmb
     - Source Path                                   
     - Source Module                                 
     * Source Level                                  
       ----------
       * Source Name                                 COREPT_TEMPLATE
       ----------
       * Source Name                                 KEY-EXIT

DECLARE
   ls_Form_Id     FORMMODULE;
   ls_Data_type   VARCHAR2(30);
   ls_process_id WEBUTIL_HOST.process_id;
BEGIN 
   ls_Form_Id    := FIND_FORM( lower('AIRPORT'));
   ls_Data_type  := TO_CHAR(ls_Form_Id.ID);
    
   IF Plot_Global_Pkg.ltab_Process_ID.COUNT >= 1 THEN
       
       FOR plot_exe_no IN Plot_Global_Pkg.ltab_Process_ID.FIRST..Plot_Global_Pkg.ltab_Process_ID.LAST
       LOOP
          IF Plot_Global_Pkg.ltab_Process_ID(plot_exe_no).ls_DataType = ls_Data_type THEN
             --Plot_Global_Pkg.Exit_CorePTDU_Plot(Plot_Global_Pkg.ltab_Process_ID(plot_exe_no).ln_Process_ID);
             ls_process_id.handle :=TO_number(Plot_Global_Pkg.ltab_Process_ID(plot_exe_no).ln_Process_ID);
             --FORMS11g PITSS
             WEBUTIL_HOST.Terminate_Process(ls_process_id);
          END IF;   
      END LOOP; 
   
   END IF;
   
   IF :system.mode = 'NORMAL' and :parameter.work_type != 'VIEW' THEN
      CHECK_TO_COMMIT('EXIT');
   END IF;
   
   Set_Application_Property(cursor_style,'DEFAULT');
   
   Exit_form;
END;
   - Fire in Enter-Query Mode                        Yes
   - Execution Hierarchy                             Override
   - Display in 'Keyboard Help'                      No
   - 'Keyboard Help' Text

   ----------
   * Name                                            WHEN-FORM-NAVIGATE
   - Subclass Information                            
   - Comments                                        
   - Trigger Style                                   PL/SQL
   * Trigger Text                                    

IF :system.form_status = 'CHANGED' AND Name_In('global.check_save') = 'Y' THEN --5320
	Check_Save_PRC('Airport');
END IF;

if :global.from_error_summary != 'Y' then
if nvl(:control_block.from_multiple,'0') != '0' then
  set_block_property('pl_std_airport_sr',DEFAULT_WHERE, 
  'rowid = chartorowid('''||:control_block.from_multiple||''')');
else
	set_block_property('pl_std_airport_sr',DEFAULT_WHERE, 
  'data_supplier = '''||:global.data_supplier||'''');
	if :display_item_block.allow_both_cycles = 'N' then
	  :pl_std_airport_sr.processing_cycle := :global.processing_cycle;
  end if;
end if;
end if;

if :global.from_error_summary != 'Y' then
:pl_tld_airport_mr.data_supplier := :global.data_supplier;
if :display_item_block.allow_both_cycles = 'N' then
	:pl_tld_airport_mr.processing_cycle := :global.processing_cycle;

--Begin Fix - SCR 5767 -Madhu -- 14-Sep-2012
DECLARE
   v_flag           NUMBER;
   v_allow_update   NUMBER := 0;
   v_block_name     VARCHAR2 (30) := :SYSTEM.cursor_block;
BEGIN
   v_allow_update := 0;

   IF :SYSTEM.record_status IN ('NEW', 'INSERT') THEN
      IF :parameter.record_type = 'T' THEN
         IF NAME_IN (v_block_name || '.processing_cycle') IS NULL THEN
            v_Flag :=  validate_customer (:global.dcr_number,:global.processing_cycle,:global.data_supplier,:parameter.record_type,NAME_IN (v_block_name || '.customer_ident'));
         ELSE
            v_Flag := validate_customer (:global.dcr_number,NAME_IN (v_block_name || '.processing_cycle'),:global.data_supplier,:parameter.record_type,NAME_IN (v_block_name || '.customer_ident'));
         END IF;
      ELSE
         IF NAME_IN (v_block_name || '.processing_cycle') IS NULL THEN
            v_Flag :=  validate_customer (:global.dcr_number,:global.processing_cycle,:global.data_supplier,:parameter.record_type);
         ELSE
            v_Flag := validate_customer (:global.dcr_number,NAME_IN (v_block_name || '.processing_cycle'),:global.data_supplier,:parameter.record_type);
         END IF;
      END IF;

      IF :global.data_supplier IN ('J', 'L', 'E') THEN
         IF v_Flag IN (6, 4, 3, 2, 1) THEN
            v_allow_update := 1;
         ELSIF v_Flag = 0 THEN

						IF name_in(v_block_name||'.processing_cycle') IS NULL THEN
							dsp_msg ( 'Customer is not associated with DCR# '|| :global.dcr_number|| ' Or with processing cycle '||:global.processing_cycle);
						ELSE
							dsp_msg ( 'Customer is not associated with DCR# '|| :global.dcr_number|| ' Or with processing cycle '||name_in(v_block_name||'.processing_cycle'));
						END	IF;
            RAISE FORM_trigger_failure;
         END IF;
      ELSIF :global.data_supplier IN ('Q', 'N')THEN
         IF v_Flag = 5 THEN
            v_allow_update := 1;
         END IF;
      END IF;
   END IF;
END;
--End Fix - SCR 5767 -Madhu -- 14-Sep-2012

if :pl_tld_airport_mr.processing_cycle is null then
	:pl_tld_airport_mr.processing_cycle := :global.processing_cycle;
end if;
if :system.record_status != 'NEW' then
  if :pl_tld_airport_mr.processing_cycle != :pl_tld_airport_mr.old_processing_cycle then
  	IF refresh_master_library.check_reference_info('PL_TLD_AIRPORT_MR','P') = 'N' THEN
			:pl_tld_airport_mr.processing_cycle := :pl_tld_airport_mr.old_processing_cycle;
  	END IF;
  end if;	
end if;
:pl_tld_airport_mr.old_processing_cycle := :pl_tld_airport_mr.processing_cycle;

--Begin Fix -- SCR 7470 --Madhu
IF :pl_tld_airport_mr.chk = 'Y' THEN
      :parameter.multi_rec_del := :parameter.multi_rec_del + 1;
ELSIF :pl_tld_airport_mr.chk = 'N' THEN
      :parameter.multi_rec_del := :parameter.multi_rec_del - 1;
END IF;



DECLARE
	ls_group VARCHAR2(50) := 'NEW_DCR';
	group_id      recordgroup := find_group(ls_group);
	ln_row         NUMBER := Get_Group_Row_Count(group_id);
	col_id        groupcolumn := find_column('NEW_DCR.DCR_NO');	
	col_val       NUMBER;
BEGIN
	IF :pl_tld_airport_mr.chk = 'Y' THEN
		add_group_row(group_id, end_of_group);
		ln_row := ln_row + 1;
		set_group_number_cell('NEW_DCR.DCR_NO', ln_row, :pl_tld_airport_mr.create_dcr_number);

		:global.new_dcr_no := rtrim(ltrim(rtrim(:global.new_dcr_no,', ')||','||:pl_tld_airport_mr.create_dcr_number,', '),', ');

	ELSIF NVL(:pl_tld_airport_mr.chk,'N') = 'N' THEN	
		FOR i IN 1..ln_row LOOP
			col_val := GET_GROUP_NUMBER_CELL(col_id, i);
			IF col_val = :pl_tld_airport_mr.create_dcr_number THEN
				delete_group_row(group_id,i);
				exit;
			END IF;
		END LOOP;
		delete_dcr_no;
	--	END IF;
	END IF;

END;
--End Fix -- SCR 7470 --Madhu

if :global.from_error_summary != 'Y' then
if nvl(:control_block.from_multiple,'0') != '0' then
  set_block_property('pl_tld_airport_sr',DEFAULT_WHERE, 
  'rowid = chartorowid('''||:control_block.from_multiple||''')');
else
	set_block_property('pl_tld_airport_sr',DEFAULT_WHERE, 
  'data_supplier = '''||:global.data_supplier||'''');
  if :display_item_block.allow_both_cycles = 'N' then
	  :pl_tld_airport_sr.processing_cycle := :global.processing_cycle;
  end if;

set_item_property('control_block.TLD_VALIDATION_ERRORS_SR',VISIBLE,PROPERTY_FALSE);

--Begin Fix - SCR 5767 -Madhu -- 14-Sep-2012
DECLARE
   v_flag           NUMBER;
   v_allow_update   NUMBER := 0;
   v_block_name     VARCHAR2 (30) := :SYSTEM.cursor_block;
BEGIN
   IF :SYSTEM.record_status IN ('NEW', 'INSERT') THEN
      IF :parameter.record_type = 'T' THEN
         IF NAME_IN (v_block_name || '.processing_cycle') IS NULL THEN
            v_Flag :=
               validate_customer (:global.dcr_number,:global.processing_cycle,:global.data_supplier,:parameter.record_type,NAME_IN (v_block_name || '.customer_ident'));
         ELSE
            v_Flag :=
               validate_customer (:global.dcr_number,NAME_IN (v_block_name || '.processing_cycle'),:global.data_supplier,:parameter.record_type,NAME_IN (v_block_name || '.customer_ident'));
         END IF;
      ELSE
         IF NAME_IN (v_block_name || '.processing_cycle') IS NULL THEN
            v_Flag :=
               validate_customer (:global.dcr_number,:global.processing_cycle,:global.data_supplier,:parameter.record_type);
         ELSE
            v_Flag :=
               validate_customer (:global.dcr_number,NAME_IN (v_block_name || '.processing_cycle'),:global.data_supplier,:parameter.record_type);
         END IF;
      END IF;

      IF :global.data_supplier IN ('J', 'L', 'E') THEN
         IF v_Flag IN (6, 4, 3, 2, 1) THEN
            v_allow_update := 1;
         ELSIF v_Flag = 0 THEN
       			IF name_in(v_block_name||'.processing_cycle') IS NULL THEN
							dsp_msg ( 'Customer is not associated with DCR# '|| :global.dcr_number|| ' Or with processing cycle '||:global.processing_cycle);
						ELSE
							dsp_msg ( 'Customer is not associated with DCR# '|| :global.dcr_number|| ' Or with processing cycle '||name_in(v_block_name||'.processing_cycle'));
						END	IF;
            RAISE FORM_trigger_failure;
         END IF;
      ELSIF :global.data_supplier IN ('Q', 'N') THEN
         IF v_Flag = 5
         THEN
            v_allow_update := 1;
         END IF;
      END IF;
   END IF;
END;
--End Fix - SCR 5767 -Madhu -- 14-Sep-2012

if :pl_tld_airport_sr.processing_cycle is null then
	:pl_tld_airport_sr.processing_cycle := :global.processing_cycle;
end if;
if :system.record_status != 'NEW' then
  if :pl_tld_airport_sr.processing_cycle != :pl_tld_airport_sr.old_processing_cycle then
  	IF refresh_master_library.check_reference_info('PL_TLD_AIRPORT_SR','P') = 'N' THEN
			pause;
			:pl_tld_airport_sr.processing_cycle := :pl_tld_airport_sr.old_processing_cycle;
  	END IF;
  end if;	
end if;
:pl_tld_airport_sr.old_processing_cycle := :pl_tld_airport_sr.processing_cycle;

:control_block.from_multiple := null;

     - Fire in Enter-Query Mode                      Yes
     - Execution Hierarchy                           Override
     - Display in 'Keyboard Help'                    No
     - 'Keyboard Help' Text                          
     - Trigger Steps                                 
     ----------
     * Name                                          PRE-QUERY
     - Subclass Information                          
     - Comments                                      
     - Trigger Style                                 PL/SQL
     * Trigger Text                                  

if nvl(:control_block.from_multiple,'0') != '0' then
  set_block_property('std_airport_sr',DEFAULT_WHERE, 
  'rowid = chartorowid('''||:control_block.from_multiple||''')');
else
	set_block_property('pl_std_airport_sr',DEFAULT_WHERE, 
  'data_supplier = '''||:global.data_supplier||'''');
end if;

:control_block.from_multiple := null;

     - Fire in Enter-Query Mode                      Yes
     - Execution Hierarchy                           Override
     - Display in 'Keyboard Help'                    No
     - 'Keyboard Help' Text                          
     - Trigger Steps                                 
     ----------
     * Name                                          PRE-QUERY
     - Subclass Information                          
     - Comments                                      
     - Trigger Style                                 PL/SQL
     * Trigger Text                                  

if nvl(:control_block.from_multiple,'0') != '0' then
  set_block_property('tld_airport_sr',DEFAULT_WHERE, 
  'rowid = chartorowid('''||:control_block.from_multiple||''')');
else
	set_block_property('tld_airport_sr',DEFAULT_WHERE, 
  'data_supplier = '''||:global.data_supplier||'''');
end if;

       - Comments                                    
       - Trigger Style                               PL/SQL
       ^ Trigger Text                                

declare
	total_rows   number;
	V_BUTTON     NUMBER(1);
begin
	if :system.form_status = 'CHANGED' then
		dsp_msg('There is changes in the form, please do commit first.');
	else	
		total_rows := get_group_row_count(find_group('Refresh_Records_Group'));
		v_button := display_alert.more_buttons('S','Refresh Record',
								'You have modified or inserted or deleted '||total_rows||' record(s). '||chr(10)||
						  	'Do you want to refresh the Master Library now?'||chr(10)||chr(10),
						    'Refresh', 'Cancel');
		if v_button = 1 then
			refresh_master_library.refresh_records(total_rows);
		else
			null;
		end if;
	end if;	
end;
       - Fire in Enter-Query Mode                    Yes
       - Execution Hierarchy                         Override
       - Display in 'Keyboard Help'                  No

DECLARE 
   ls_Plotting_Function_Command        VARCHAR2(6000);
   ls_Query                            VARCHAR2(6000);
   ls_Plotting_Function_Dir            VARCHAR2(600);   
   ls_Table_Name                       VARCHAR2(30);
   ln_Record_Count                     NUMBER      := 1;
   ls_Call_Plotting_Function           PLS_INTEGER := 1; 
   ls_Call_Plotting_Function1          PLS_INTEGER;
   ls_Form_Id                          FORMMODULE;
   MY_PROCESS_ID  WEBUTIL_HOST.PROCESS_ID;
	 ls_Plot_URL VARCHAR2(1024);--Fix SCR 6088 --Madhu --03-Oct-2013
	 ls_Data_Type VARCHAR2(50):='AIRPORT';
BEGIN

   ls_Form_Id                                  := FIND_FORM( lower('AIRPORT'));
   BEGIN
       ls_Plotting_Function_Dir                := PLOT_GLOBAL_PKG.GetInstallationDir;
       Plot_Global_Pkg.ln_Plot_Process_Counter := NVL(PLOT_GLOBAL_PKG.ltab_Process_ID.COUNT, 0) + 1;
       -- FORMS11g PITSS       ln_Record_Count                         := PLOT_GLOBAL_PKG.Get_Process_Count;
       
   EXCEPTION
        WHEN OTHERS THEN
       
           ls_Plotting_Function_Dir := 'C:\Program Files\Honeywell Inc., Aviation Services\CorePTDU Tool\';
           ln_Record_Count          := 1;
   END;  

   IF :parameter.record_type = 'S'     AND :parameter.library_access = 'PRE-LIBRARY' THEN
      ls_Table_Name        := 'PL_STD_AIRPORT';
   
   ELSIF :parameter.record_type = 'T'  AND :parameter.library_access = 'PRE-LIBRARY' THEN
      ls_Table_Name        := 'PL_TLD_AIRPORT';
   
   ELSIF :parameter.record_type = 'S'  AND :parameter.library_access = 'MASTER'      THEN
      ls_Table_Name         := 'STD_AIRPORT';
   
   ELSIF :parameter.record_type = 'T'  AND :parameter.library_access = 'MASTER'      THEN
      ls_Table_Name         := 'TLD_AIRPORT';
   END IF;
   ls_Query := UPPER(GET_BLOCK_PROPERTY(ls_Table_Name||'_MR',Last_Query));

 
   IF INSTR(ls_Query,'FROM') > 0 THEN
      ls_Query := SUBSTR(ls_Query,INSTR(ls_Query,' FROM '));    

      IF INSTR(ls_Query,'ORDER BY') >= 1 THEN
         ls_Query := SUBSTR(ls_Query,1,INSTR(ls_Query,'ORDER BY')-1);
      END IF;
	
   END IF;
 
   IF ln_Record_Count >= 10 THEN
      dsp_msg('Attn !!!! Maximum of 10 Plot Windows are already opened, please close atleast one Plot Window to open new Plot Window');
   ELSE  
      IF ls_Query IS NOT NULL THEN
         Fetch_Plotting_Data.Get_Record_Count(ls_Query,ls_Table_Name,ln_Record_Count);
      ELSE
          ln_Record_Count := 0; 
      END IF;   
      IF ln_Record_Count      > 0 AND Get_Item_Property(ls_Table_Name||'_MR.AIRPORT_IDENT',DATABASE_VALUE)IS NOT NULL THEN   
--Begin Fix SCR 6088 --Madhu --03-Oct-2013
      	ls_Plot_URL:=:GLOBAL.ls_Plot_URL||'?username='||:global.user_name
      										||'&password='||:global.password
      										||'&connectstr='||:global.connect_string
      										||'&datatype='||ls_Data_Type
      										||'&query='||ls_Query;
      	IF :DISPLAY_ITEM_BLOCK.gearth = 'Y' THEN
 
      		WEB.SHOW_DOCUMENT(ls_Plot_Url,'_blank');
      		--WEB.SHOW_DOCUMENT ('javascript:window.open("'||ls_Plot_URL||'","","location=no,fullscreen=yes,toolbar=no,menubar=no,status=no,top=0,left=0,resizable=yes,height=600,width=800");self.close()','_blank');   
     -- location=no,toolbar=no,menubar=no,status=no,top=0,left=0,resizable=yes,fullscreen=yes,titlebar=no,
      	ELSE
--End Fix SCR 6088 --Madhu --03-Oct-2013      		
         ls_Plotting_Function_Command  := ls_Plotting_Function_Dir||'CorePTDU.exe'
                                          ||' -user:'||:global.user_name
                                          ||' -password:'||:global.password
                                          ||' -connectstr:'||:global.connect_string
                                          ||' -datatype:'||'AIRPORT'
                                          ||' -query:'||ls_Query;     
         
     
 
         --ls_Call_Plotting_Function1     := Plot_
         -- FORMS 11g PITSS
         --message(ls_Plotting_Function_Command);synchronize;pause;
         MY_PROCESS_ID     := WEBUTIL_HOST.NonBlocking(ls_Plotting_Function_Command);
--Global_Pkg.WinExec(ls_Plotting_Function_Command, ls_Call_Plotting_Function);   

         BEGIN
	         Plot_Global_Pkg.ltab_Process_ID(Plot_Global_Pkg.ln_Plot_Process_Counter).ln_Process_ID 
	                       := TO_NUMBER (MY_PROCESS_ID.handle); 
	         Plot_Global_Pkg.ltab_Process_ID(Plot_Global_Pkg.ln_Plot_Process_Counter).ls_DataType   
	                       := TO_CHAR(ls_Form_Id.ID);
          EXCEPTION
             WHEN OTHERS THEN
                NULL;
          END; 
       END IF;--Fix SCR 6088 --Madhu --03-Oct-2013
         GO_BLOCK(ls_Table_Name||'_MR');    
      ELSE
         dsp_msg('Invalid/No Data to plot');
      END IF;   
   END IF;
END;
 



       - Fire in Enter-Query Mode                    Yes
       - Execution Hierarchy                         Override
       - Display in 'Keyboard Help'                  No
       - 'Keyboard Help' Text

--Begin SCR 7470 --Madhu
DECLARE
	group_id      recordgroup := find_group('NEW_DCR');
	ln_row        NUMBER := get_group_row_count(group_id); 
	col_val       NUMBER;	
	ln_row1	NUMBER;
BEGIN

	If :Control_Block.Chk_Unchk_All = 'Y' Then
		--7470
			IF NOT Id_Null(find_group('NEW_DCR')) THEN 
 				Delete_Group_Row( 'NEW_DCR', ALL_ROWS ); 
			END IF;
			FOR i IN 1..ln_row LOOP
			 delete_dcr_no;
			END LOOP;
			ln_row  := get_group_row_count(group_id);

     Go_Block ('pl_tld_airport_mr');
     First_record;
     Loop

        :pl_tld_airport_mr.Chk := 'Y';
        :parameter.multi_rec_del := :parameter.multi_rec_del + 1;
        add_group_row(group_id, end_of_group);
				ln_row := ln_row + 1;
				--set_group_number_cell('NEW_DCR.DCR_NO', ln_row, :pl_tld_airport_mr.create_dcr_number);
				set_group_number_cell('NEW_DCR.DCR_NO', ln_row, :pl_tld_airport_mr.create_dcr_number);
				:global.new_dcr_no := rtrim(ltrim(:global.new_dcr_no||','||:pl_tld_airport_mr.create_dcr_number,', '),', ');
        --Exit When :SYSTEM.Last_Record = 'TRUE';
     		If :pl_tld_airport_mr.Customer_Ident Is Not Null Then
     			Next_record;
     		Else
     			Clear_Record;
     			:pl_tld_airport_mr.Chk := 'Y';
     			Exit;
     		End If;	
     	--END IF;
     End Loop;
     First_record;
    Else
     :parameter.multi_rec_del := 0;
     ln_row  := get_group_row_count(group_id)-1;
     Go_Block ('pl_tld_airport_mr');
     First_record;
     Loop
        IF :pl_tld_airport_mr.chk = 'Y' THEN
	        :pl_tld_airport_mr.Chk := 'N';
	        FOR i IN 1..ln_row LOOP
						col_val := get_group_number_cell('NEW_DCR.DCR_NO',i);		
						IF col_val = :pl_tld_airport_mr.create_dcr_number THEN
							delete_group_row(group_id,i);
							EXIT;
						END IF;
	        END LOOP;
	      END IF;
					delete_dcr_no;
			
	        Exit When :SYSTEM.Last_Record = 'TRUE';
	        Next_record;
	     	/*	If :pl_tld_airport_mr.Customer_Ident Is Not Null Then
	     			Next_record;
	     		Else
	     			Clear_Record;
	     			:pl_tld_airport_mr.Chk := 'N';
	     			Exit;
	     		End If;	*/
	     --	END IF;
       --7470
     End Loop;
     First_record;
    End If;
END;
-- End Fix - SCR 7470 - Madhu

   - Filter Before Display                           No

     - Source Module

   - Comments                                        
   o Program Unit Text                               

PROCEDURE check_to_commit (p_action_type VARCHAR2)
IS
   v_button        NUMBER (1);
   total_rows      NUMBER;
   v_temp          VARCHAR2 (4000);
   v_button_text   VARCHAR2 (100);
   msgnum          NUMBER       := MESSAGE_CODE; -- Fix - SCR 5180 - Eswar KC - 09-Sep-2011 
BEGIN
   IF :SYSTEM.form_status = 'CHANGED'THEN
      IF p_action_type = 'COMMIT' THEN
         v_button_text := 'Cancel';
      ELSIF p_action_type = 'EXIT' THEN
         v_button_text := 'Exit Without Save';
      ELSE
         v_button_text := 'Cancel Modification';
      END IF;

      IF :GLOBAL.lib_refreshed = 'Y' THEN
         v_button :=
            display_alert.more_buttons
                       ('S','Refresh Record','You have modified record(s). Select an option: '|| CHR (10)|| ' '|| CHR (10)|| 
                         --'1. Save without refreshing the Master Library'||chr(10)|| -- Fix - SCR 5180 - Eswar KC - 09-Sep-2011 
                           '1. Save and refresh Master Library'|| CHR (10)|| 
						   						 '2. Cancel modification, NO Save, NO Refresh',
                           'Save&Refresh',v_button_text
                        );

         IF v_button IN (1) THEN -- changed from in (1,2) to in (1) -- Fix - SCR 5180 - Eswar KC - 09-Sep-2011 
            COMMIT_FORM;
            total_rows := GET_GROUP_ROW_COUNT (FIND_GROUP ('Refresh_Records_Group'));
            
			      IF total_rows > 0 THEN
               refresh_master_library.refresh_records (total_rows);
            END IF;
         		IF (msgnum = 40400) THEN  -- Fix - SCR 5180 - Eswar KC - 09-Sep-2011 
             CLEAR_MESSAGE; 
         		END IF;    
		 		 END IF;
      ELSE
         IF p_action_type = 'COMMIT' THEN
            v_button := 1;
         ELSE
            v_button :=
               display_alert.more_buttons
                  ('S','Refresh Record','Record is modified or inserted or deleted. Select an option: '|| CHR (10)|| ' ',
                   'Save',v_button_text
                  );
         END IF;
-- Begin Fix - SCR 5180 - Eswar KC - 09-Sep-2011 
         IF v_button = 1 THEN
            COMMIT_FORM;
            IF (msgnum = 40400) THEN 
            	CLEAR_MESSAGE; 
            END IF; 
         ELSE
            EXIT_FORM (no_commit); 
         END IF;
-- End Fix - SCR 5180 - Eswar KC - 09-Sep-2011          
      END IF;

      -- Here the v_button values are chnaged 2 in place of 3, 1 in place of 2 for SCR 5180 - Eswar KC
      IF    (:GLOBAL.lib_refreshed = 'Y' AND v_button = 2)
         OR (:GLOBAL.lib_refreshed != 'Y' AND v_button = 1)
      THEN
         IF p_action_type = 'COMMIT' THEN
            NULL;
         ELSIF p_action_type = 'EXIT' THEN
            SET_APPLICATION_PROPERTY (cursor_style, 'DEFAULT');
            EXIT_FORM (no_commit);
         ELSE
            CLEAR_BLOCK (no_commit);
         END IF;
      ELSE
         IF :SYSTEM.form_status = 'CHANGED' THEN
            RAISE form_trigger_failure;
         END IF;
      END IF;
   --if :system.form_status != 'CHANGED' then
   -- invalid_record_count(:system.cursor_block,:system.cursor_record,:system.cursor_item);
   --end if;
   ELSE
      refresh_master_library.if_refresh;
   END IF;
END;
   o Program Unit Type                               Procedure
   ----------
   * Name                                            POPULATE_REL_RECORD
   - Subclass Information                            
   - Comments                                        
   * Program Unit Text                               

PROCEDURE populate_rel_record 
     (p_block   in    varchar2,
      p_srec    out   pl_std_airport%rowtype,
      p_trec    out   pl_tld_airport%rowtype) IS
BEGIN
  if upper(p_block) = 'PL_STD_AIRPORT_SR' then
  	p_srec.recommended_navaid_ident          := :pl_std_airport_sr.recommended_navaid_ident;
  	p_srec.recommended_navaid_icao_code      := :pl_std_airport_sr.recommended_navaid_icao_code;
    p_srec.validate_ind                      := :pl_std_airport_sr.validate_ind;
    if :global.recent_cycle >= :pl_std_airport_sr.processing_cycle then
  		p_srec.processing_cycle := :pl_std_airport_sr.processing_cycle;
  	else
  		p_srec.processing_cycle := :global.recent_cycle;
  	end if;
    --p_srec.processing_cycle                  := :pl_std_airport_sr.processing_cycle;
    p_srec.data_supplier                     := :pl_std_airport_sr.data_supplier;
  	p_srec.create_dcr_number                 := :pl_std_airport_sr.create_dcr_number;
  elsif upper(p_block) = 'PL_STD_AIRPORT_MR' then
  	p_srec.recommended_navaid_ident          := :pl_std_airport_mr.recommended_navaid_ident;
  	p_srec.recommended_navaid_icao_code      := :pl_std_airport_mr.recommended_navaid_icao_code;
    p_srec.validate_ind                      := :pl_std_airport_mr.validate_ind;
    --p_srec.processing_cycle                  := :pl_std_airport_mr.processing_cycle;
    if :global.recent_cycle >= :pl_std_airport_mr.processing_cycle then
  		p_srec.processing_cycle := :pl_std_airport_mr.processing_cycle;
  	else
  		p_srec.processing_cycle := :global.recent_cycle;
  	end if;
    p_srec.data_supplier                     := :pl_std_airport_mr.data_supplier;
    p_srec.create_dcr_number                 := :pl_std_airport_mr.create_dcr_number;
  elsif upper(p_block) = 'PL_TLD_AIRPORT_SR' then
  	p_trec.recommended_navaid_ident          := :pl_tld_airport_sr.recommended_navaid_ident;
  	p_trec.recommended_navaid_icao_code      := :pl_tld_airport_sr.recommended_navaid_icao_code;
    p_trec.validate_ind                      := :pl_tld_airport_sr.validate_ind;
    p_trec.customer_ident                    := :pl_tld_airport_sr.customer_ident;
    p_trec.data_supplier                     := :pl_tld_airport_sr.data_supplier;
  	p_trec.generated_in_house_flag           := :pl_tld_airport_sr.generated_in_house_flag;
  	--p_trec.processing_cycle                  := :pl_tld_airport_sr.processing_cycle;
  	if :global.recent_cycle >= :pl_tld_airport_sr.processing_cycle then
  		p_trec.processing_cycle := :pl_tld_airport_sr.processing_cycle;
  	else
  		p_trec.processing_cycle := :global.recent_cycle;
  	end if;
  	p_trec.create_dcr_number                 := :pl_tld_airport_sr.create_dcr_number;
  elsif upper(p_block) = 'PL_TLD_AIRPORT_MR' then
  	p_trec.recommended_navaid_ident          := :pl_tld_airport_mr.recommended_navaid_ident;
  	p_trec.recommended_navaid_icao_code      := :pl_tld_airport_mr.recommended_navaid_icao_code;
    p_trec.validate_ind                      := :pl_tld_airport_mr.validate_ind;
    p_trec.customer_ident                    := :pl_tld_airport_mr.customer_ident;
    p_trec.data_supplier                     := :pl_tld_airport_mr.data_supplier;
    p_trec.generated_in_house_flag           := :pl_tld_airport_mr.generated_in_house_flag;
  	--p_trec.processing_cycle                  := :pl_tld_airport_mr.processing_cycle;
  /*	if :global.recent_cycle >= :pl_tld_airport_mr.processing_cycle then
  		p_trec.processing_cycle := :pl_tld_airport_mr.processing_cycle;
  	else
  		p_trec.processing_cycle := :global.recent_cycle;
  	end if;*/
  	p_trec.processing_cycle 								 := :pl_tld_airport_mr.processing_cycle; -- Fix SCR 07595- Ashish N- 19-Dec-2023
  	p_trec.create_dcr_number                 := :pl_tld_airport_sr.create_dcr_number;
  end if;     
END;
   * Program Unit Type                               Procedure
   ----------
   * Name                                            POPULATE_RECORD
   - Subclass Information                            
   - Comments                                        
   * Program Unit Text                               

PROCEDURE populate_record
    (p_block  in   varchar2,
     p_record out  sdv_records.cr_airport) IS       
BEGIN
  -- Populate v_record;
  if upper(p_block) = 'PL_STD_AIRPORT_SR' then
    p_record.record_type			             := :parameter.record_type;
    p_record.airport_elevation             := :pl_std_airport_sr.AIRPORT_ELEVATION;
    p_record.airport_icao                  := :pl_std_airport_sr.AIRPORT_ICAO;
    p_record.airport_ident                 := :pl_std_airport_sr.AIRPORT_IDENT;
    p_record.airport_name                  := :pl_std_airport_sr.AIRPORT_NAME;
    p_record.apt_ref_pt_latitude           := :pl_std_airport_sr.APT_REF_PT_LATITUDE;
    p_record.apt_ref_pt_longitude          := :pl_std_airport_sr.APT_REF_PT_LONGITUDE;
    p_record.cust_area_code                := :pl_std_airport_sr.AREA_CODE;
    p_record.ata_iata_designator           := rpad(nvl(:pl_std_airport_sr.ATA_IATA_DESIGNATOR,' '),3);
    p_record.cycle_data                    := :pl_std_airport_sr.CYCLE_DATA;
    p_record.datum_code                    := rpad(nvl(:pl_std_airport_sr.DATUM_CODE,' '),3);
    p_record.daylight_ind                  := nvl(:pl_std_airport_sr.DAYLIGHT_IND,' ');
    p_record.file_recno                    := lpad(to_char(:pl_std_airport_sr.FILE_RECNO),5,'0');
    p_record.ifr_capability                := nvl(:pl_std_airport_sr.IFR_CAPABILITY,' ');
    p_record.longest_runway                := nvl(lpad(to_char(:pl_std_airport_sr.LONGEST_RUNWAY),3,'0'),'   ');
    p_record.longest_runway_surface_code   := nvl(:pl_std_airport_sr.LONGEST_RUNWAY_SURFACE_CODE,' ');
    p_record.magnetic_true_ind             := nvl(:pl_std_airport_sr.MAGNETIC_TRUE_IND,' ');
    p_record.magnetic_variation            := rpad(nvl(:pl_std_airport_sr.MAGNETIC_VARIATION,' '),5);
    p_record.public_military_ind           := nvl(:pl_std_airport_sr.PUBLIC_MILITARY_IND,' ');
    p_record.recommended_navaid_icao_code  := :pl_std_airport_sr.RECOMMENDED_NAVAID_ICAO_CODE;
    p_record.recommended_navaid_ident      := :pl_std_airport_sr.RECOMMENDED_NAVAID_IDENT;
    p_record.speed_limit                   := nvl(lpad(to_char(:pl_std_airport_sr.SPEED_LIMIT),3,'0'),'   ');
    p_record.speed_limit_altitude          := rpad(nvl(:pl_std_airport_sr.SPEED_LIMIT_ALTITUDE,' '),5);
    p_record.time_zone                     := rpad(nvl(:pl_std_airport_sr.TIME_ZONE,' '),3);
    p_record.transition_altitude           := nvl(lpad(to_char(:pl_std_airport_sr.TRANSITION_ALTITUDE),5,'0'),'     ');
    p_record.transition_level              := nvl(lpad(to_char(:pl_std_airport_sr.TRANSITION_LEVEL),5,'0'),'     ');
    p_record.ctld_arsp_ind                 := nvl(:pl_std_airport_sr.ctld_arsp_ind,' '); -- SCR 3935 -- Sesha 
  elsif upper(p_block) = 'PL_STD_AIRPORT_MR' then
    p_record.record_type			             := :parameter.record_type;
    p_record.airport_elevation             := :pl_std_airport_mr.AIRPORT_ELEVATION;
    p_record.airport_icao                  := :pl_std_airport_mr.AIRPORT_ICAO;
    p_record.airport_ident                 := :pl_std_airport_mr.AIRPORT_IDENT;
    p_record.airport_name                  := :pl_std_airport_mr.AIRPORT_NAME;
    p_record.apt_ref_pt_latitude           := :pl_std_airport_mr.APT_REF_PT_LATITUDE;
    p_record.apt_ref_pt_longitude          := :pl_std_airport_mr.APT_REF_PT_LONGITUDE;
    p_record.cust_area_code                := :pl_std_airport_mr.AREA_CODE;
    p_record.ata_iata_designator           := rpad(nvl(:pl_std_airport_mr.ATA_IATA_DESIGNATOR,' '),3);
    p_record.cycle_data                    := :pl_std_airport_mr.CYCLE_DATA;
    p_record.datum_code                    := rpad(nvl(:pl_std_airport_mr.DATUM_CODE,' '),3);
    p_record.daylight_ind                  := nvl(:pl_std_airport_mr.DAYLIGHT_IND,' ');
    p_record.file_recno                    := lpad(to_char(:pl_std_airport_mr.FILE_RECNO),5,'0');
    p_record.ifr_capability                := nvl(:pl_std_airport_mr.IFR_CAPABILITY,' ');
    p_record.longest_runway                := nvl(lpad(to_char(:pl_std_airport_mr.LONGEST_RUNWAY),3,'0'),'   ');
    p_record.longest_runway_surface_code   := nvl(:pl_std_airport_mr.LONGEST_RUNWAY_SURFACE_CODE,' ');
    p_record.magnetic_true_ind             := nvl(:pl_std_airport_mr.MAGNETIC_TRUE_IND,' ');
    p_record.magnetic_variation            := rpad(nvl(:pl_std_airport_mr.MAGNETIC_VARIATION,' '),5);
    p_record.public_military_ind           := nvl(:pl_std_airport_mr.PUBLIC_MILITARY_IND,' ');
    p_record.recommended_navaid_icao_code  := :pl_std_airport_mr.RECOMMENDED_NAVAID_ICAO_CODE;
    p_record.recommended_navaid_ident      := :pl_std_airport_mr.RECOMMENDED_NAVAID_IDENT;
    p_record.speed_limit                   := nvl(lpad(to_char(:pl_std_airport_mr.SPEED_LIMIT),3,'0'),'   ');
    p_record.speed_limit_altitude          := rpad(nvl(:pl_std_airport_mr.SPEED_LIMIT_ALTITUDE,' '),5);
    p_record.time_zone                     := rpad(nvl(:pl_std_airport_mr.TIME_ZONE,' '),3);
    p_record.transition_altitude           := nvl(lpad(to_char(:pl_std_airport_mr.TRANSITION_ALTITUDE),5,'0'),'     ');
    p_record.transition_level              := nvl(lpad(to_char(:pl_std_airport_mr.TRANSITION_LEVEL),5,'0'),'     ');
    p_record.ctld_arsp_ind                 := nvl(:pl_std_airport_mr.ctld_arsp_ind,' '); -- SCR 3935 -- Sesha 
  elsif upper(p_block) = 'PL_TLD_AIRPORT_SR' then
    p_record.record_type			             := :parameter.record_type;
    p_record.airport_elevation             := :pl_tld_airport_sr.AIRPORT_ELEVATION;
    p_record.airport_icao                  := :pl_tld_airport_sr.AIRPORT_ICAO;
    p_record.airport_ident                 := :pl_tld_airport_sr.AIRPORT_IDENT;
    p_record.airport_name                  := :pl_tld_airport_sr.AIRPORT_NAME;
    p_record.apt_ref_pt_latitude           := :pl_tld_airport_sr.APT_REF_PT_LATITUDE;
    p_record.apt_ref_pt_longitude          := :pl_tld_airport_sr.APT_REF_PT_LONGITUDE;
    p_record.cust_area_code                := :pl_tld_airport_sr.Customer_ident;
    p_record.ata_iata_designator           := rpad(nvl(:pl_tld_airport_sr.ATA_IATA_DESIGNATOR,' '),3);
    p_record.cycle_data                    := :pl_tld_airport_sr.CYCLE_DATA;
    p_record.datum_code                    := rpad(nvl(:pl_tld_airport_sr.DATUM_CODE,' '),3);
    p_record.daylight_ind                  := nvl(:pl_tld_airport_sr.DAYLIGHT_IND,' ');
    p_record.file_recno                    := lpad(to_char(:pl_tld_airport_sr.FILE_RECNO),5,'0');
    p_record.ifr_capability                := nvl(:pl_tld_airport_sr.IFR_CAPABILITY,' ');
    p_record.longest_runway                := nvl(lpad(to_char(:pl_tld_airport_sr.LONGEST_RUNWAY),3,'0'),'   ');
    p_record.longest_runway_surface_code   := nvl(:pl_tld_airport_sr.LONGEST_RUNWAY_SURFACE_CODE,' ');
    p_record.magnetic_true_ind             := nvl(:pl_tld_airport_sr.MAGNETIC_TRUE_IND,' ');
    p_record.magnetic_variation            := rpad(nvl(:pl_tld_airport_sr.MAGNETIC_VARIATION,' '),5);
    p_record.public_military_ind           := nvl(:pl_tld_airport_sr.PUBLIC_MILITARY_IND,' ');
    p_record.recommended_navaid_icao_code  := :pl_tld_airport_sr.RECOMMENDED_NAVAID_ICAO_CODE;
    p_record.recommended_navaid_ident      := :pl_tld_airport_sr.RECOMMENDED_NAVAID_IDENT;
    p_record.speed_limit                   := nvl(lpad(to_char(:pl_tld_airport_sr.SPEED_LIMIT),3,'0'),'   ');
    p_record.speed_limit_altitude          := rpad(nvl(:pl_tld_airport_sr.SPEED_LIMIT_ALTITUDE,' '),5);
    p_record.time_zone                     := rpad(nvl(:pl_tld_airport_sr.TIME_ZONE,' '),3);
    p_record.transition_altitude           := nvl(lpad(to_char(:pl_tld_airport_sr.TRANSITION_ALTITUDE),5,'0'),'     ');
    p_record.transition_level              := nvl(lpad(to_char(:pl_tld_airport_sr.TRANSITION_LEVEL),5,'0'),'     ');
    p_record.ctld_arsp_ind                 := nvl(:pl_tld_airport_sr.ctld_arsp_ind,' '); -- SCR 3935 -- Sesha 
  elsif upper(p_block) = 'PL_TLD_AIRPORT_MR' then
    p_record.record_type			             := :parameter.record_type;
    p_record.airport_elevation             := :pl_tld_airport_mr.AIRPORT_ELEVATION;
    p_record.airport_icao                  := :pl_tld_airport_mr.AIRPORT_ICAO;
    p_record.airport_ident                 := :pl_tld_airport_mr.AIRPORT_IDENT;
    p_record.airport_name                  := :pl_tld_airport_mr.AIRPORT_NAME;
    p_record.apt_ref_pt_latitude           := :pl_tld_airport_mr.APT_REF_PT_LATITUDE;
    p_record.apt_ref_pt_longitude          := :pl_tld_airport_mr.APT_REF_PT_LONGITUDE;
    p_record.cust_area_code                := :pl_tld_airport_mr.customer_ident;
    p_record.ata_iata_designator           := rpad(nvl(:pl_tld_airport_mr.ATA_IATA_DESIGNATOR,' '),3);
    p_record.cycle_data                    := :pl_tld_airport_mr.CYCLE_DATA;
    p_record.datum_code                    := rpad(nvl(:pl_tld_airport_mr.DATUM_CODE,' '),3);
    p_record.daylight_ind                  := nvl(:pl_tld_airport_mr.DAYLIGHT_IND,' ');
    p_record.file_recno                    := lpad(to_char(:pl_tld_airport_mr.FILE_RECNO),5,'0');
    p_record.ifr_capability                := nvl(:pl_tld_airport_mr.IFR_CAPABILITY,' ');
    p_record.longest_runway                := nvl(lpad(to_char(:pl_tld_airport_mr.LONGEST_RUNWAY),3,'0'),'   ');
    p_record.longest_runway_surface_code   := nvl(:pl_tld_airport_mr.LONGEST_RUNWAY_SURFACE_CODE,' ');
    p_record.magnetic_true_ind             := nvl(:pl_tld_airport_mr.MAGNETIC_TRUE_IND,' ');
    p_record.magnetic_variation            := rpad(nvl(:pl_tld_airport_mr.MAGNETIC_VARIATION,' '),5);
    p_record.public_military_ind           := nvl(:pl_tld_airport_mr.PUBLIC_MILITARY_IND,' ');
    p_record.recommended_navaid_icao_code  := :pl_tld_airport_mr.RECOMMENDED_NAVAID_ICAO_CODE;
    p_record.recommended_navaid_ident      := :pl_tld_airport_mr.RECOMMENDED_NAVAID_IDENT;
    p_record.speed_limit                   := nvl(lpad(to_char(:pl_tld_airport_mr.SPEED_LIMIT),3,'0'),'   ');
    p_record.speed_limit_altitude          := rpad(nvl(:pl_tld_airport_mr.SPEED_LIMIT_ALTITUDE,' '),5);
    p_record.time_zone                     := rpad(nvl(:pl_tld_airport_mr.TIME_ZONE,' '),3);
    p_record.transition_altitude           := nvl(lpad(to_char(:pl_tld_airport_mr.TRANSITION_ALTITUDE),5,'0'),'     ');
    p_record.transition_level              := nvl(lpad(to_char(:pl_tld_airport_mr.TRANSITION_LEVEL),5,'0'),'     ');
    p_record.ctld_arsp_ind                 := nvl(:pl_tld_airport_mr.ctld_arsp_ind,' '); -- SCR 3935 -- Sesha 
  end if;  
END;
   * Program Unit Type                               Procedure
   ----------
   * Name                                            INITIALIZE_FORM
   * Subclass Information                            
     ----------
     * Source File                                   corept_template.fmb
     - Source Path                                   
     - Source Module                                 
     * Source Level                                  
       ----------
       * Source Name                                 COREPT_TEMPLATE
       ----------
       * Source Name                                 INITIALIZE_FORM
       ----------
     ----------
   - Comments                                        
   o Program Unit Text                               

PROCEDURE INITIALIZE_FORM IS
	fname	varchar2(100) := get_application_property(CURRENT_FORM_NAME);
	wn_id window := Find_Window('BASE_WINDOW');
	v_name  varchar2(50) := get_window_property(wn_id, TITLE);
	v_block varchar2(30) := Get_Form_Property(fname,FIRST_NAVIGATION_BLOCK);
	v_err varchar2(300);
BEGIN
	 
  default_value('J','global.data_supplier');
  default_value('I','global.lib_refreshed');
  default_value('99999','global.dcr_number');
  default_value('200406','global.processing_cycle');
  default_value('N','global.from_error_summary');
  default_value('200406','global.recent_cycle');
  default_value('MAXIMIZE','global.Status_Window'); 
  default_value(null,'global.customer_ident');
  default_value(null,'global.allroles');
  /*********************************************************************/
  /*********************************************************************/
  /* Global Variables declared Plotting Function- updated as part of scr 2303.00 */
  -- Declaring Common variables
  default_value('cpt','global.user_name');
  default_value('cpt','global.password');
  default_value('cpt','global.connect_string');
  default_value('airport','global.data_type');
  default_value('airport','global.table_name');
  default_value('ml','global.schema_type');
  default_value('blank','global.last_query');  
  :global.user_name := Get_Application_Property(USERNAME);
  :global.password := Get_Application_Property(PASSWORD);
  :global.connect_string := Get_Application_Property(CONNECT_STRING);  
  :global.Status_Window := get_window_property('BASE_WINDOW',window_state);
  if name_in('global.Status_Window') = 'MAXIMIZE' then
		set_window_property('BASE_WINDOW', window_state, MAXIMIZE);
	else
		set_window_property('BASE_WINDOW', window_state, NORMAL);
	end if;
  --set_window_property('BASE_WINDOW', window_SIZE, 760, 440);
  
  -- activate all roles
  v_err := set_role(:global.allroles);
  if v_err != 'PASSED' then
		-- The roles cannot be activated
		display_alert.one_button('S','Fatal Error',
		'The roles cannot be activated.  Contact the COREPT Administrator.');
		exit_form;
  else
--  Continue
  if :global.processing_cycle is null then
    begin
      select max(processing_cycle) 
      into   :global.processing_cycle
      from pl_std_airport;
    exception
  	  when no_data_found then
  	   :global.processing_cycle := null;
    end;
  end if;
	/********************************************/
/********************************************/
-- Updated for Plotting Function
	:global.user_name := Get_Application_Property(USERNAME);
  :global.password := Get_Application_Property(PASSWORD);
  :global.connect_string := Get_Application_Property(CONNECT_STRING);
/********************************************/
/********************************************/

	if substr(v_block,1,3) in ('PL_','STD','TLD') then
		if :parameter.record_type = 'S' then
			v_name := 'STD '||v_name;
		elsif :parameter.record_type = 'T' then
			v_name := 'TLD '||v_name;
		end if;
		if :parameter.library_access = 'PRE-LIBRARY' THEN
			v_name := 'PL '||v_name;
		else
			v_name := 'ML '||v_name;
		end if;
	end if;	
	set_window_property(wn_id, TITLE, v_name);
	
/*
	IF :parameter.library_access = 'PRE-LIBRARY' THEN
		set_item_property('DISPLAY_ITEM_BLOCK.PROCESSING_CYCLE',DISPLAYED, PROPERTY_TRUE);
		:DISPLAY_ITEM_BLOCK.PROCESSING_CYCLE := :global.processing_cycle;
	END IF;
*/
	
	IF :parameter.library_access = 'PRE-LIBRARY' THEN																	   -- MOD
		activate_role;
		set_item_property('DISPLAY_ITEM_BLOCK.PROCESSING_CYCLE',DISPLAYED, PROPERTY_TRUE); -- MOD
		set_item_property('DISPLAY_ITEM_BLOCK.PROCESSING_CYCLE',WIDTH, 60);								 -- MOD
		:DISPLAY_ITEM_BLOCK.PROCESSING_CYCLE := :global.processing_cycle;								   -- MOD
	elsif :global.new_processing_cycle != 111111 then																	   -- MOD
		set_item_property('DISPLAY_ITEM_BLOCK.PROCESSING_CYCLE',DISPLAYED, PROPERTY_TRUE); -- MOD
		set_item_property('DISPLAY_ITEM_BLOCK.PROCESSING_CYCLE',WIDTH, 80);                -- MOD
		:DISPLAY_ITEM_BLOCK.PROCESSING_CYCLE := :global.old_processing_cycle||' - '||:global.new_processing_cycle; -- MOD
	end if;																																						   -- MOD

	populate_items(fname);
	unset_query_menu_items;
	
	if :global.lib_refreshed = 'Y' and :parameter.work_type != 'VIEW' then
		-- Create the Refresh Records Group
		declare
			group_id       recordgroup;
			col1_id        groupcolumn;
			col2_id        groupcolumn;
			col3_id        groupcolumn;
			col4_id        groupcolumn;
		begin		
			group_id := create_group('Refresh_Records_Group');
			col1_id := Add_group_column(group_id,'dcr_number',number_column);
			col2_id := Add_group_column(group_id,'table_name',char_column,30);
			col3_id := Add_group_column(group_id,'valida_ind',char_column,1);
			col4_id := Add_group_column(group_id,'proc_cycle',number_column);
		end;
	end if;
	end if;
END;
   o Program Unit Type                               Procedure
   ----------
   * Name                                            DSP_ERROR
   * Subclass Information                            
     ----------
     * Source File                                   corept_template.fmb
     - Source Path                                   
     - Source Module                                 
     * Source Level                                  
       ----------
       * Source Name                                 COREPT_TEMPLATE
       ----------
       * Source Name                                 DSP_ERROR
       ----------
     ----------
   - Comments                                        
   ^ Program Unit Text                               

PROCEDURE DSP_ERROR(ERR_MSG IN VARCHAR2) IS
  alert_id    alert;
  choice      number(3);
BEGIN
  set_alert_property('ERROR_MESSAGE', alert_message_text,ERR_MSG); 
  alert_id := find_alert ('ERROR_MESSAGE');
  choice := show_alert(alert_id);
END;

   o Program Unit Type                               Procedure
   ----------
   * Name                                            POPULATE_ITEMS
   * Subclass Information                            
     ----------
     * Source File                                   corept_template.fmb
     - Source Path                                   
     - Source Module                                 
     * Source Level                                  
       ----------
       * Source Name                                 COREPT_TEMPLATE
       ----------
       * Source Name                                 POPULATE_ITEMS
       ----------
     ----------
   - Comments                                        
   ^ Program Unit Text                               

PROCEDURE POPULATE_ITEMS(mname IN varchar2) IS
	scr_description	varchar2(100);
	scr_part_number	varchar2(100);
BEGIN	
	get_module_information(mname, scr_description, scr_part_number);
--Begin Fix SCR 101 -- Madhu -- 09-Apr-2012
	IF Name_In('parameter.work_type') = 'VIEW' THEN
		:DISPLAY_ITEM_BLOCK.FORM_DESC := substr(scr_description,1,instr(scr_description,'/')-1)||substr(scr_description,instr(scr_description,'/')+7);
	ELSE
		:DISPLAY_ITEM_BLOCK.FORM_DESC := scr_description;
	END IF;
--End Fix SCR 101 -- Madhu -- 09-Apr-2012
	:DISPLAY_ITEM_BLOCK.FORM_DATE_TIME := to_char(sysdate,'DD-MON-YYYY HH24:MI:SS');
	:DISPLAY_ITEM_BLOCK.FORM_NAME := mname;
	:DISPLAY_ITEM_BLOCK.FORM_PART_NUMBER := scr_part_number;
	BEGIN
		SELECT data_supplier_name
		INTO   :DISPLAY_ITEM_BLOCK.FORM_SOURCE
		FROM   data_supplier
		WHERE  data_supplier = nvl(:GLOBAL.DATA_SUPPLIER,'T');
	Exception
		When no_data_found then
		:DISPLAY_ITEM_BLOCK.FORM_SOURCE := :GLOBAL.DATA_SUPPLIER;
	End;	
   SELECT DECODE(nvl(:parameter.record_type,'S'),'S','STANDARD','T','TAILORED','UNKNOWN')||', '||:parameter.library_access||', '||
				  DECODE(nvl(:parameter.work_type,'VIEW'),'VIEW','Query Only','Data Entry')
   INTO   :DISPLAY_ITEM_BLOCK.FORM_RECORD_TYPE
   FROM   dual;
END;
   o Program Unit Type                               Procedure
   ----------
   * Name                                            DO_VALIDATE
   - Subclass Information                            
   - Comments                                        
   * Program Unit Text                               

PROCEDURE do_validate(p_block varchar2,p_ignore_ref varchar2 := 'Y') IS
  v_record  sdv_records.cr_airport;       
	v_err_ind	number := 0;
	v_err_list cpt_types.errlist_type;
	v_all_err varchar2(4000) := null;
	v_srec    pl_std_airport%rowtype;
	v_trec    pl_tld_airport%rowtype;
	v_nerr    number := 0;
	v_valid   varchar2(1) := null;
	v_ind     varchar2(1) := 'Y';
BEGIN
	if name_in(p_block||'.airport_ident') is not null then 
	Set_Application_Property(cursor_style,'BUSY');
	if :parameter.record_type = 'S' then
		:CONTROL_BLOCK.STD_OVERRIDE_ERRORS := null;
	else
		:CONTROL_BLOCK.TLD_OVERRIDE_ERRORS := null;
	end if;
	-- Populate v_record;
  populate_record(p_block,v_record);
  -- Call stored procedure to validate
  RECSV1.VAIRPORT(v_record,v_err_list,v_err_ind);
  -- Check the result
  IF v_err_ind != 0 THEN
  	for i in 1..v_err_list.count loop
   	  if not is_override(:global.data_supplier, name_in(p_block||'.processing_cycle'), 'AIRPORT', v_err_list(i)) then
   	  	v_all_err := v_all_err||' * '||to_char(v_err_list(i))||' - '||get_err_text(v_err_list(i));
   	  	v_ind := 'I';
   	  else
   	  	if v_ind != 'I' then
   	  		v_ind := 'O';
   	  	end if;
   	  end if;	
    end loop;
  END IF;
  -- Perform relational validation
  populate_rel_record(p_block, v_srec, v_trec);
  if ((:parameter.record_type = 'S') and 
  	  (v_srec.recommended_navaid_ident is not null)) 
  	 or
  	 ((:parameter.record_type = 'T') and 
  	  (v_trec.recommended_navaid_ident is not null)) then
  	recrv1.vairport(:parameter.record_type, v_srec, v_trec, v_nerr, v_valid, p_ignore_ref,'DU'); -- Pass DU agrument SCR 07595 - Ashish N- 19-Dec-2023
    if v_nerr > 0 then
    	v_all_err := v_all_err||get_err_text(218);
    end if;	
  end if; 
  -- Set validate_ind and display message
  Set_Ind_and_Message(p_block, v_all_err, :parameter.work_type, p_ignore_ref, v_ind);
  if p_ignore_ref = 'N' then
  	SET_UPDATE_DCR(upper(p_block), v_record);
  end if;	
  Set_Override_Button(p_block);
  Set_Application_Property(cursor_style,'DEFAULT');
  ELSE
  	set_initial_error_display(P_BLOCK);
  end if;
END;
   * Program Unit Type                               Procedure
   ----------
   * Name                                            PLOT_GLOBAL_PKG
   * Subclass Information                            
     ----------
     * Source File                                   corept_template.fmb
     - Source Path                                   
     - Source Module                                 
     * Source Level
