/* Package is created and used by Plotting Function */
PACKAGE PLOT_GLOBAL_PKG IS
   TYPE ltyp_Plot_Process IS RECORD
   (ln_Process_ID   PLS_INTEGER,
    ls_DataType     VARCHAR2(30));

   TYPE ltyp_Process_ID IS TABLE OF ltyp_Plot_Process
   INDEX BY BINARY_INTEGER;
   
   ltab_Process_ID           ltyp_Process_ID; 
   ln_Plot_Process_Counter   INTEGER;
   ls_Plotting_Function_Dir  VARCHAR2(2000);

   Ffi_error        BOOLEAN;
   Ffi_error_text   VARCHAR2 (2000);
   Ffi_error_code   NUMBER;

   FUNCTION Winexec (Cmd IN OUT VARCHAR2, Ucmdshow IN OUT PLS_INTEGER)
      RETURN PLS_INTEGER;

   FUNCTION Getcoreptdupid
      RETURN PLS_INTEGER;

   FUNCTION get_process_count
      RETURN PLS_INTEGER;

   FUNCTION GetInstallationDir
      RETURN VARCHAR2;

   PROCEDURE Exit_coreptdu_plot (Pi_sprocess_id VARCHAR2);

END;
   o Program Unit Type                               Package Spec
   ----------
   * Name                                            PLOT_GLOBAL_PKG
   * Subclass Information                            
     ----------
     * Source File                                   corept_template.fmb
     - Source Path                                   
     - Source Module                                 
     * Source Level                                  
       ----------
       * Source Name                                 COREPT_TEMPLATE
       ----------
       * Source Name                                 PLOT_GLOBAL_PKG
       ----------
     ----------
   - Comments                                        
   ^ Program Unit Text                               

/* Package is created and used by Plotting Function */
PACKAGE BODY PLOT_GLOBAL_PKG IS
   /* Declare the library and function handles. */
   Getcoreptdupid_lhandle       Ora_ffi.Libhandletype;
   Getcoreptdupid_fhandle       Ora_ffi.Funchandletype;
   Exit_coreptdu_plot_fhandle   Ora_ffi.Funchandletype;
   get_process_count_fhandle    Ora_ffi.Funchandletype;
   GetInstallationDir_fhandle   Ora_ffi.Funchandletype;

   -- Private Package Variables
   Lh_kernel32                  Ora_ffi.Libhandletype;
   Fh_winexec                   Ora_ffi.Funchandletype;
   
   FUNCTION Getcoreptdupid_handle (Fhandle Ora_ffi.Funchandletype)
   RETURN PLS_INTEGER;
   PRAGMA INTERFACE (C, Getcoreptdupid_handle, 11265);

   FUNCTION get_process_count_handle (Fhandle Ora_ffi.Funchandletype)
   RETURN PLS_INTEGER;
   PRAGMA INTERFACE (C, get_process_count_handle, 11265);


   FUNCTION Exit_coreptdu_plot_handle (Fhandle         Ora_ffi.Funchandletype,
                                       Ls_process_id   VARCHAR2)
   RETURN PLS_INTEGER;
   PRAGMA INTERFACE (C, Exit_coreptdu_plot_handle, 11265);
   
   FUNCTION GetInstallationDir_handle (Fhandle Ora_ffi.Funchandletype)
   RETURN VARCHAR2;
   PRAGMA INTERFACE (C, GetInstallationDir_handle, 11265);

   
   FUNCTION Getcoreptdupid
   RETURN PLS_INTEGER IS
   BEGIN
      RETURN (Getcoreptdupid_handle (Getcoreptdupid_fhandle));
   END Getcoreptdupid;

   FUNCTION get_process_count
   RETURN PLS_INTEGER IS
   BEGIN
      RETURN (get_process_count_handle (get_process_count_fhandle));
   END get_process_count;

   PROCEDURE Exit_coreptdu_plot (Pi_sprocess_id VARCHAR2)
   AS 
      Ls_return   PLS_INTEGER;
   BEGIN
      Ls_return := Exit_coreptdu_plot_handle (Exit_coreptdu_plot_fhandle,
                                              Pi_sprocess_id);
   END;
   
   FUNCTION GetInstallationDir
   RETURN VARCHAR2 IS
   BEGIN
      RETURN (GetInstallationDir_handle (GetInstallationDir_fhandle));
   END GetInstallationDir;
   
   PROCEDURE Loadlibrary;

   FUNCTION I_winexec (Functionhandle   IN       Ora_ffi.Funchandletype,
                       Cmd              IN OUT   VARCHAR2,
                       Ucmdshow         IN       PLS_INTEGER)
   RETURN PLS_INTEGER;

   PROCEDURE Rg_winexec;
   PRAGMA INTERFACE (C, I_winexec, 11265);

   PROCEDURE Loadlibrary IS
   BEGIN
      BEGIN
         Lh_kernel32 := Ora_ffi.Find_library ('KERNEL32.DLL');
      EXCEPTION
         WHEN Ora_ffi.Ffi_error THEN
            Lh_kernel32 := Ora_ffi.Load_library (NULL, 'KERNEL32.DLL');
      END;
   EXCEPTION
      WHEN OTHERS THEN
         Ffi_error := TRUE ;
         Ffi_error_text := Tool_err.message;
         Ffi_error_code := Tool_err.Code;
         FOR Ierrors IN 1 .. Tool_err.Nerrors
         LOOP
            message ('KERNEL32: ' || Tool_err.message);
            Tool_err.Pop;
         END LOOP;
         Tool_err.CLEAR;
   END Loadlibrary;

   PROCEDURE Rg_winexec IS
   BEGIN
      Fh_winexec := Ora_ffi.Register_function (Lh_kernel32,
                                               'WinExec',
                                               Ora_ffi.C_std);
      Ora_ffi.Register_parameter (Fh_winexec, Ora_ffi.C_char_ptr);
      Ora_ffi.Register_parameter (Fh_winexec, Ora_ffi.C_int);
      Ora_ffi.Register_return (Fh_winexec, Ora_ffi.C_int);
   EXCEPTION
      WHEN OTHERS THEN
         Ffi_error := TRUE ;
         Ffi_error_text := Tool_err.message;
         Ffi_error_code := Tool_err.Code;
         FOR Ierrors IN 1 .. Tool_err.Nerrors
         LOOP
            message ('KERNEL32: ' || Tool_err.message);
            Tool_err.Pop;
         END LOOP;
         Tool_err.CLEAR;
   END Rg_winexec;

   FUNCTION Winexec (Cmd IN OUT VARCHAR2, Ucmdshow IN OUT PLS_INTEGER)
   RETURN PLS_INTEGER IS 
      Rc           PLS_INTEGER;
      L_cmd        VARCHAR2 (8192) := rpad (substr (nvl (Cmd, ' '), 1, 8192), 8192, chr (0));
      L_ucmdshow   PLS_INTEGER     := Ucmdshow;
   BEGIN
      Rc       := I_winexec (Fh_winexec, L_cmd, L_ucmdshow);
      Cmd      := L_cmd;
      Ucmdshow := L_ucmdshow;
      RETURN Rc;
   END Winexec;

BEGIN
   /*
   BEGIN
	   Getcoreptdupid_lhandle :=
	      Ora_ffi.Load_library ('C:\Program Files\Honeywell Inc., Aviation Services\CorePTDU Tool\','PFUtils.dll');
	
	   -- Register the foreign function. 
	   Getcoreptdupid_fhandle := Ora_ffi.Register_function (Getcoreptdupid_lhandle,
	                                                        'GetCorePTDUPID',
	                                                        Ora_ffi.C_std);
	
	   Ora_ffi.Register_return (Getcoreptdupid_fhandle, Ora_ffi.C_int);
	
	   get_process_count_fhandle := Ora_ffi.Register_function (Getcoreptdupid_lhandle,
	                                                           'get_process_count',
	                                                           Ora_ffi.C_std);
	
	   Ora_ffi.Register_return (get_process_count_fhandle, Ora_ffi.C_int);
	
	   GetInstallationDir_fhandle := Ora_ffi.Register_function (Getcoreptdupid_lhandle,
	                                                            'GetInstallationDir',
	                                                            Ora_ffi.C_std);
	                                                            
	   Ora_ffi.Register_return (GetInstallationDir_fhandle, Ora_ffi.C_char_ptr);
	
	   Exit_coreptdu_plot_fhandle :=
	                             Ora_ffi.Register_function (Getcoreptdupid_lhandle,
	                                                        'KillDUApp',
	                                                        Ora_ffi.C_std);
	                                                        
	   Ora_ffi.Register_parameter (Exit_coreptdu_plot_fhandle,
	                               Ora_ffi.C_char_ptr);

   EXCEPTION
      WHEN OTHERS THEN
         NULL;
   END;      
   	
   Loadlibrary;
   Rg_winexec;
   */
   NULL;
END PLOT_GLOBAL_PKG;
   o Program Unit Type                               Package Body
   ----------
   * Name                                            SET_UPDATE_DCR
   - Subclass Information                            
   - Comments                                        
   * Program Unit Text                               

PROCEDURE SET_UPDATE_DCR(p_block varchar2, p_record sdv_records.cr_airport) IS
	get_rec_cur  cpt_types.refcur;
	rtld_airport PL_TLD_AIRPORT%rowtype;
	rstd_airport PL_STD_AIRPORT%rowtype;
	v_dcr        number      := name_in(p_block||'.create_dcr_number');
	v_cycle_data varchar2(4) := substr(name_in(p_block||'.processing_cycle'),3);
	v_count      number      := 0;
BEGIN
	if p_block like 'PL_STD%' then
		open get_rec_cur for select * from pl_std_airport
							           where create_dcr_number = v_dcr;	
		loop
		fetch get_rec_cur into rstd_airport;
		exit when get_rec_cur%notfound;
		  v_count := v_count + 1;
		  if nvl(p_record.airport_elevation,0)      != nvl(rstd_airport.AIRPORT_ELEVATION,0) or
         nvl(p_record.airport_name,' ')         != nvl(rstd_airport.AIRPORT_NAME,' ') or
         nvl(p_record.apt_ref_pt_latitude,' ')  != nvl(rstd_airport.APT_REF_PT_LATITUDE,' ') or
         nvl(p_record.apt_ref_pt_longitude,' ') != nvl(rstd_airport.APT_REF_PT_LONGITUDE,' ') or
         nvl(p_record.cust_area_code,' ')       != nvl(rstd_airport.AREA_CODE,' ') or
         p_record.ata_iata_designator           != rpad(nvl(rstd_airport.ATA_IATA_DESIGNATOR,' '),3) or
         p_record.datum_code                    != rpad(nvl(rstd_airport.DATUM_CODE,' '),3) or
         p_record.daylight_ind                  != nvl(rstd_airport.DAYLIGHT_IND,' ') or
         p_record.ctld_arsp_ind                 != nvl(rstd_airport.CTLD_ARSP_IND,' ') or -- SCR 3935 -- Sesha 
         p_record.ifr_capability                != nvl(rstd_airport.IFR_CAPABILITY,' ') or
         p_record.longest_runway                != nvl(lpad(to_char(rstd_airport.LONGEST_RUNWAY),3,'0'),'   ') or
         p_record.longest_runway_surface_code   != nvl(rstd_airport.LONGEST_RUNWAY_SURFACE_CODE,' ') or
         p_record.magnetic_true_ind             != nvl(rstd_airport.MAGNETIC_TRUE_IND,' ') or
         p_record.magnetic_variation            != rpad(nvl(rstd_airport.MAGNETIC_VARIATION,' '),5) or
         p_record.public_military_ind           != nvl(rstd_airport.PUBLIC_MILITARY_IND,' ') or
         nvl(p_record.recommended_navaid_icao_code,' ')  != nvl(rstd_airport.RECOMMENDED_NAVAID_ICAO_CODE,' ') or
         nvl(p_record.recommended_navaid_ident,' ')      != nvl(rstd_airport.RECOMMENDED_NAVAID_IDENT,' ') or
         p_record.speed_limit                   != nvl(lpad(to_char(rstd_airport.SPEED_LIMIT),3,'0'),'   ') or
         p_record.speed_limit_altitude          != rpad(nvl(rstd_airport.SPEED_LIMIT_ALTITUDE,' '),5) or
         p_record.time_zone                     != rpad(nvl(rstd_airport.TIME_ZONE,' '),3) or
         p_record.transition_altitude           != nvl(lpad(to_char(rstd_airport.TRANSITION_ALTITUDE),5,'0'),'     ') or
         p_record.transition_level              != nvl(lpad(to_char(rstd_airport.TRANSITION_LEVEL),5,'0'),'     ') then
         copy(:global.dcr_number, p_block||'.update_dcr_number');
         copy(v_cycle_data, p_block||'.CYCLE_DATA');		
		  end if;  
		end loop;
		close get_rec_cur;
	elsif p_block like 'PL_TLD%' then
		open get_rec_cur for select * from pl_tld_airport
							           where create_dcr_number = v_dcr;
		loop
		fetch get_rec_cur into rtld_airport;
		exit when get_rec_cur%notfound;
		  v_count := v_count + 1;
			if nvl(p_record.airport_elevation,0)      != nvl(rtld_airport.AIRPORT_ELEVATION,0)or
    		 nvl(p_record.airport_name,' ')         != nvl(rtld_airport.AIRPORT_NAME,' ')or
	       nvl(p_record.apt_ref_pt_latitude,' ')  != nvl(rtld_airport.APT_REF_PT_LATITUDE,' ')or
  	     nvl(p_record.apt_ref_pt_longitude,' ') != nvl(rtld_airport.APT_REF_PT_LONGITUDE,' ')or
    	   p_record.ata_iata_designator           != rpad(nvl(rtld_airport.ATA_IATA_DESIGNATOR,' '),3)or
	       p_record.datum_code                    != rpad(nvl(rtld_airport.DATUM_CODE,' '),3)or
  	     p_record.daylight_ind                  != nvl(rtld_airport.DAYLIGHT_IND,' ')or
  	     p_record.ctld_arsp_ind                 != nvl(rtld_airport.CTLD_ARSP_IND,' ') or -- SCR 3935 -- Sesha 
    	   p_record.ifr_capability                != nvl(rtld_airport.IFR_CAPABILITY,' ')or
      	 p_record.longest_runway                != nvl(lpad(to_char(rtld_airport.LONGEST_RUNWAY),3,'0'),'   ')or
	       p_record.longest_runway_surface_code   != nvl(rtld_airport.LONGEST_RUNWAY_SURFACE_CODE,' ')or
  	     p_record.magnetic_true_ind             != nvl(rtld_airport.MAGNETIC_TRUE_IND,' ')or
    	   p_record.magnetic_variation            != rpad(nvl(rtld_airport.MAGNETIC_VARIATION,' '),5)or
      	 p_record.public_military_ind           != nvl(rtld_airport.PUBLIC_MILITARY_IND,' ')or
	       nvl(p_record.recommended_navaid_icao_code,' ')  != NVL(rtld_airport.RECOMMENDED_NAVAID_ICAO_CODE,' ')or
  	     nvl(p_record.recommended_navaid_ident,' ')      != nvl(rtld_airport.RECOMMENDED_NAVAID_IDENT,' ')or
    	   p_record.speed_limit                   != nvl(lpad(to_char(rtld_airport.SPEED_LIMIT),3,'0'),'   ')or
      	 p_record.speed_limit_altitude          != rpad(nvl(rtld_airport.SPEED_LIMIT_ALTITUDE,' '),5)or
	       p_record.time_zone                     != rpad(nvl(rtld_airport.TIME_ZONE,' '),3)or
  	     p_record.transition_altitude           != nvl(lpad(to_char(rtld_airport.TRANSITION_ALTITUDE),5,'0'),'     ')or
    	   p_record.transition_level              != nvl(lpad(to_char(rtld_airport.TRANSITION_LEVEL),5,'0'),'     ') then
       	copy(:global.dcr_number, p_block||'.update_dcr_number');
       	copy(v_cycle_data, p_block||'.CYCLE_DATA');
	     end if;  
		end loop;
		close get_rec_cur;
	end if;
	if v_count = 0 then   -- it is a new record
		copy(:global.dcr_number, p_block||'.update_dcr_number');
		copy(v_cycle_data, p_block||'.CYCLE_DATA');
	end if;
END;
   * Program Unit Type                               Procedure
   ----------
   * Name                                            DELETE_DCR_NO
   - Subclass Information                            
   - Comments                                        
   * Program Unit Text                               

--Begin SCR 7470 --Madhu
PROCEDURE delete_dcr_no IS
	ls_length NUMBER;
	ls_DCR1   VARCHAR2(32000);
	ls_DCR2   VARCHAR2(32000);
BEGIN
	ls_length := instr(','||:global.new_dcr_no||',',','||:pl_tld_airport_mr.create_dcr_number||',');
	IF ls_length = 1 THEN
		ls_DCR1 := null;
	ELSE	
		ls_DCR1 := rtrim(ltrim(substr(:global.new_dcr_no,1,ls_length-2),', '),', ');
	END IF;
	ls_DCR2 := rtrim(ltrim(substr(:global.new_dcr_no,ls_length+1+length(:pl_tld_airport_mr.create_dcr_number)),', '),', ');
	:global.new_dcr_no := ltrim(ls_DCR1||','||ls_DCR2,', ');
END;
--End Fix SCR 7470 --Madhu
